englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Mansur ibn Yunus has been transmitted by me from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Abdullah ibn Jafar Al-Himyari, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Isa, from Ali ibn Hadid and Muhammad ibn Ismail ibn Bazi together, from Mansur ibn Yunus Bazraj.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن منصور بن يونس فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عبد اللّه بن جعفر الحميريّ، عن أحمد بن محمّد بن عيسى، عن عليّ بن حديد؛ و محمّد بن إسماعيل ابن بزيع جميعا عن منصور بن يونس بزرج‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Muhammad Ibn Al-Fayd Al-Taymi
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Muhammad ibn Al-Fayd Al-Taymi has been transmitted by me from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Ahmad ibn Idris, from Ahmad ibn Abi Abdullah, from Dawud ibn Ishaq Al-Haddha', from Muhammad ibn Al-Fayd Al-Taymi.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن محمّد بن الفيض التيميّ فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن أحمد بن إدريس، عن أحمد بن أبي عبد اللّه، عن داود بن إسحاق الحذّاء، عن محمّد بن الفيض التيميّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Abd Al-mu'min Ibn Al-Qasim Al-Ansari Al-Kufi
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Abd Al-Mu'min ibn Al-Qasim Al-Ansari Al-Kufi has been transmitted by me from my father - may Allah (swt) have mercy on him - from Sad ibn Abdullah, from Muhammad ibn Al-Husayn ibn Abi Al-Khattab, from Al-Hakam ibn Maskeen, from Abu Kahmas, from Abd Al-Mu'min ibn Al-Qasim Al-Ansari Al-Kufi, who was an Arab and the brother of Abu Maryam Abd Al-Ghaffar ibn Al-Qasim Al-Ansari.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عبد المؤمن بن القاسم الأنصاريّ الكوفيّ فقد رويته عن أبي- رحمه اللّه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن محمّد بن الحسين بن أبي الخطّاب، عن الحكم بن مسكين، عن أبي كهمس، عن عبد المؤمن بن القاسم الأنصاريّ الكوفيّ عربيّ، و هو أخو أبي مريم عبد الغفّار بن القاسم الأنصاريّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Idris Ibn Hilal
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Idris ibn Hilal has been transmitted by me from Muhammad ibn Ali Majilawayh - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Muhammad ibn Yahya Al-Attar, from Muhammad ibn Al-Husayn ibn Abi Al-Khattab, from Muhammad ibn Sinan, from Idris ibn Hilal.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن إدريس بن هلال فقد رويته عن محمّد بن عليّ ماجيلويه- رضي اللّه عنه- عن محمّد بن يحيى العطّار، عن محمّد بن الحسين بن أبي الخطّاب، عن محمّد بن سنان عن إدريس بن هلال‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Al-Qasim Ibn Urwah
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Al-Qasim ibn Urwah has been transmitted by me from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Abdullah ibn Jafar Al-Himyari, from Harun ibn Muslim ibn Sadan, from Al-Qasim ibn Urwah.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن القاسم بن عروة فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عبد اللّه ابن جعفر الحميريّ، عن هارون بن مسلم بن سعدان، عن القاسم بن عروة.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Muhammad Ibn Qays
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Muhammad ibn Qays has been transmitted by me from my father - may Allah (swt) have mercy on him - from Sad ibn Abdullah, from Ibrahim ibn Hashim, from Abd Al-Rahman ibn Abi Najran, from Asim ibn Humayd, from Muhammad ibn Qays.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن محمّد بن قيس فقد رويته عن أبي- رحمه اللّه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه عن إبراهيم بن هاشم، عن عبد الرّحمن بن أبي نجران، عن عاصم بن حميد، عن محمّد بن قيس‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Bishr Al-Nabbal
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Bishr Al-Nabbal has been transmitted by me from Muhammad ibn Ali Majilawayh - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Muhammad ibn Yahya Al-Attar, from Ibrahim ibn Hashim, from Muhammad ibn Sinan, from Bishr Al-Nabbal.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن بشير النبّال فقد رويته عن محمّد بن عليّ ماجيلويه- رضي اللّه عنه- عن محمّد بن يحيى العطّار، عن إبراهيم بن هاشم، عن محمّد بن سنان، عن بشير النبّال‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Abd Al-Karim Ibn Amr
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Abd Al-Karim ibn Amr has been transmitted by me from my father and from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them both - from Sad ibn Abdullah, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Isa, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Abi Nasr Al-Bazanti, from Abd Al-Karim ibn Amr Al-Khathami, whose title was Karram.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عبد الكريم بن عمرو فقد رويته عن أبي؛ و محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنهما- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن أحمد بن محمّد بن عيسى، عن أحمد بن محمّد بن أبي نصر البزنطيّ، عن عبد الكريم بن عمرو الخثعميّ و لقبه كرّام‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Isa Ibn Abi Mansur
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText:
Everything in this book that is narrated from Isa ibn Abi Mansur has been transmitted by me from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan Al-Saffar, from Muhammad ibn Al-Husayn ibn Abi Al-Khattab, from Jafar ibn Bashir, from Hammad ibn Uthman, from Isa ibn Abi Mansur, whose kunya was Abu Salih. He was a Kufan and a freed servant (mawla).
We were also narrated by Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan Al-Saffar, from Yaqub ibn Yazid, from Ibn Abi Umayr, from Ibrahim ibn Abd Al-Hamid, from Abdullah ibn Sinan, from Ibn Abi Yafur, who said: I was with Abu Abdullah (as) when Isa ibn Abi Mansur approached, and he (the Imam) said to me: "If you want to see the best in this world and the best in the hereafter, then look at him."
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عيسى بن أبي منصور فقد رويته عن محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنه- عن محمّد بن الحسن الصفّار، عن محمّد بن الحسين بن أبي الخطّاب، عن جعفر بن بشير، عن حمّاد بن عثمان، عن عيسى بن أبي منصور- و كنيته أبو صالح و هو كوفيّ مولى، و حدّثنا محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنه- عن محمّد بن الحسن الصفّار، عن يعقوب ابن يزيد، عن ابن أبي عمير، عن إبراهيم بن عبد الحميد، عن عبد اللّه بن سنان، عن ابن أبي يعفور قال: كنت عند أبي عبد اللّه عليه السّلام إذ أقبل عيسى بن أبي منصور فقال لي: "إذا أردت أن تنظر خيارا في الدّنيا خيارا في الآخرة فانظر إليه".
thaqalaynSanad:
Everything in this book that is narrated from Isa ibn Abi Mansur has been transmitted by me from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan Al-Saffar, from Muhammad ibn Al-Husayn ibn Abi Al-Khattab, from Jafar ibn Bashir, from Hammad ibn Uthman, from Isa ibn Abi Mansur, whose kunya was Abu Salih. He was a Kufan and a freed servant (mawla).
We were also narrated by Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan Al-Saffar, from Yaqub ibn Yazid, from Ibn Abi Umayr, from Ibrahim ibn Abd Al-Hamid, from Abdullah ibn Sinan, from Ibn Abi Yafur, who said: I was with Abu Abdullah (as) when Isa ibn Abi Mansur approached, and he (the Imam) said to me:
thaqalaynMatn: "If you want to see the best in this world and the best in the hereafter, then look at him."

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Amr Ibn Shumr
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Amr ibn Shumr has been transmitted by me from Muhammad ibn Musa ibn Al-Mutawakkil - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Ali ibn Al-Husayn Al-Sadabadi, from Ahmad ibn Abi Abdullah Al-Barqi, from his father, from Ahmad ibn Al-Nadr Al-Khazzaz, from Amr ibn Shumr.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عمرو بن شمر فقد رويته عن محمّد بن موسى بن المتوكّل- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عليّ بن الحسين السعدآباديّ، عن أحمد بن أبي عبد اللّه البرقيّ، عن أبيه، عن أحمد بن النضر الخزّاز، عن عمرو بن شمر.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Sulayman Ibn Amr
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Sulayman ibn Amr has been transmitted by me from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan Al-Saffar, from Ahmad ibn Abi Abdullah Al-Barqi, from Ahmad ibn Ali, from Abdullah ibn Jiblah, from Ali ibn Shajarah, from Sulayman ibn Amr Al-Ahmar.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن سليمان بن عمرو فقد رويته عن محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنه- عن محمّد بن الحسن الصفّار، عن أحمد بن أبي عبد اللّه البرقيّ، عن أحمد بن عليّ، عن عبد اللّه بن جبلة، عن عليّ بن شجرة، عن سليمان بن عمرو الأحمر.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Abd Al-Malik Ibn Utbah Al-Hashimi
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Abd Al-Malik ibn Utbah Al-Hashimi has been transmitted by me from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Sad ibn Abdullah, from Muhammad ibn Al-Husayn ibn Abi Al-Khattab, from Al-Hasan ibn Ali ibn Faddal, from Muhammad ibn Abi Hamzah, from Abd Al-Malik ibn Utbah Al-Hashimi.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عبد الملك بن عتبة الهاشميّ فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن محمّد بن الحسين بن أبي الخطّاب، عن الحسن بن عليّ ابن فضّال، عن محمّد بن أبي حمزة، عن عبد الملك بن عتبة الهاشميّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Ali Ibn Abi Hamzah
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Ali ibn Abi Hamzah has been transmitted by me from Muhammad ibn Ali Majilawayh - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Muhammad ibn Yahya Al-Attar, from Muhammad ibn Al-Husayn ibn Abi Al-Khattab, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Abi Nasr Al-Bazanti, from Ali ibn Abi Hamzah.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عليّ بن أبي حمزة فقد رويته عن محمّد بن عليّ ماجيلويه- رضي اللّه عنه- عن محمّد بن يحيى العطّار، عن محمّد بن الحسين بن أبي الخطّاب، عن أحمد بن محمّد بن أبي نصر البزنطيّ، عن عليّ بن أبي حمزة.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Yahya Ibn Abi Al-Ala
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Yahya ibn Abi Al-Ala has been transmitted by me from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Al-Husayn ibn Al-Hasan ibn Aban, from Al-Husayn ibn Said, from Faddalah ibn Ayyub, from Aban ibn Uthman, from Yahya ibn Abi Al-Ala.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن يحيى بن أبي العلاء فقد رويته عن محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنه- عن الحسين بن الحسن بن أبان، عن الحسين بن سعيد، عن فضالة بن أيّوب، عن أبان بن عثمان، عن يحيى بن أبي العلاء.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Muhammad Ibn Hakim
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText:
Everything in this book that is narrated from Muhammad ibn Hakim has been transmitted by me from my father - may Allah (swt) have mercy on him - from Abdullah ibn Jafar Al-Himyari, from Ahmad ibn Abi Abdullah, from his father, from Hammad ibn Isa, from Hariz, from Muhammad ibn Hakim.
I have also narrated it from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) have mercy on him - from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan Al-Saffar, from Yaqub ibn Yazid, from Muhammad ibn Abi Umayr, from Muhammad ibn Hakim.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن محمّد بن حكيم فقد رويته عن أبي- رحمه اللّه- عن عبد اللّه بن جعفر الحميريّ، عن أحمد بن أبي عبد اللّه، عن أبيه، عن حمّاد بن عيسى، عن حريز عن محمّد بن حكيم. و رويته عن محمّد بن الحسن- رحمه اللّه- عن محمّد بن الحسن الصفّار عن يعقوب بن يزيد، عن محمّد بن أبي عمير، عن محمّد بن حكيم‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Ali Ibn Al-Hakam
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Ali ibn Al-Hakam has been transmitted by me from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Sad ibn Abdullah, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Isa, from Ali ibn Al-Hakam.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عليّ بن الحكم فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن سعد ابن عبد اللّه، عن أحمد بن محمّد بن عيسى، عن عليّ بن الحكم‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Ali Ibn Suwayd
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Ali ibn Suwayd has been transmitted by me from my father and from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them both - from Sad ibn Abdullah and Abdullah ibn Jafar Al-Himyari together, from Ali ibn Al-Hakam, from Ali ibn Suwayd.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عليّ بن سويد فقد رويته عن أبي؛ و محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنهما- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه؛ و عبد اللّه بن جعفر الحميريّ جميعا عن عليّ بن الحكم، عن عليّ بن سويد.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Idris Ibn Zayd
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Idris ibn Zayd and Ali ibn Idris, the companions of Al-Ridha (as), has been transmitted by me from Muhammad ibn Ali Majilawayh - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Ali ibn Ibrahim ibn Hashim, from his father, from Idris ibn Zayd and Ali ibn Idris, from Al-Ridha (as).
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن إدريس بن زيد؛ و عليّ بن إدريس صاحبي الرّضا عليه السّلام فقد رويته عن محمّد بن عليّ ماجيلويه- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عليّ بن إبراهيم بن هاشم، عن أبيه، عن إدريس بن زيد؛ و عليّ بن إدريس، عن الرّضا عليه السّلام‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Muhammad Ibn Humran
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText:
Everything in this book that is narrated from Muhammad ibn Humran has been transmitted by me from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Ali ibn Ibrahim, from his father, from Muhammad ibn Abi Umayr, from Muhammad ibn Humran.
I have also narrated it from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) have mercy on him - from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan Al-Saffar, from Ayyub ibn Nuh and Ibrahim ibn Hashim together, from Safwan ibn Yahya and Ibn Abi Umayr together, from Muhammad ibn Humran.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن محمّد بن حمران فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عليّ ابن إبراهيم، عن أبيه، عن محمّد بن أبي عمير، عن محمّد بن حمران. و رويته أيضا عن محمّد بن الحسن- رحمه اللّه- عن محمّد بن الحسن الصفّار، عن أيّوب بن نوح؛ و إبراهيم بن هاشم‌ جميعا عن صفوان بن يحيى؛ و ابن أبي عمير جميعا عن محمّد بن حمران‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Said Al-Naqqash
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Said Al-Naqqash has been transmitted by me from Muhammad ibn Musa ibn Al-Mutawakkil - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Ali ibn Al-Husayn Al-Sadabadi, from Ahmad ibn Abi Abdullah Al-Barqi, from his father, from Muhammad ibn Sinan, from Said Al-Naqqash.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن سعيد النقّاش فقد رويته عن محمّد بن موسى بن المتوكّل- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عليّ بن الحسين السعدآباديّ، عن أحمد بن أبي عبد اللّه البرقيّ عن أبيه، عن محمّد بن سنان، عن سعيد النقّاش‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Al-Qasim Ibn Yahya
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Al-Qasim ibn Yahya has been transmitted by me from my father and from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them both - from Sad ibn Abdullah and Al-Himyari together, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Isa and Ibrahim ibn Hashim together, from Al-Qasim ibn Yahya.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن القاسم بن يحيى فقد رويته عن أبي؛ و محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنهما- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه؛ و الحميريّ جميعا عن أحمد بن محمّد بن عيسى، و إبراهيم بن هاشم جميعا عن القاسم بن يحيى‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Al-Husayn Ibn Said
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText:
Everything in this book that is narrated from Al-Husayn ibn Said has been transmitted by me from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Al-Husayn ibn Al-Hasan ibn Aban, from Al-Husayn ibn Said.
I have also narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) have mercy on him - from Sad ibn Abdullah, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Isa, from Al-Husayn ibn Said.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن الحسين بن سعيد فقد رويته عن محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنه- عن الحسين بن الحسن بن أبان، عن الحسين بن سعيد. و رويته عن أبي- رحمه اللّه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن أحمد بن محمّد بن عيسى، عن الحسين بن سعيد.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Ghiyath Ibn Ibrahim
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Ghiyath ibn Ibrahim has been transmitted by me from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Sad ibn Abdullah, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Isa, from Muhammad ibn Ismail ibn Bazi and Muhammad ibn Yahya Al-Khazzaz, from Ghiyath ibn Ibrahim.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن غياث بن إبراهيم فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن أحمد بن محمّد بن عيسى، عن محمّد بن إسماعيل بن بزيع؛ و محمّد بن يحيى الخزّاز، عن غياث بن إبراهيم‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Ali Ibn Muhammad Al-Nawfali
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Ali ibn Muhammad Al-Nawfali has been transmitted by me from Muhammad ibn Ali Majilawayh - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from his father, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Khalid, from his father, from Ali ibn Muhammad Al-Nawfali.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عليّ بن محمّد النوفليّ فقد رويته عن محمّد بن عليّ ماجيلويه- رضي اللّه عنه- عن أبيه، عن أحمد بن محمّد بن خالد، عن أبيه، عن عليّ بن محمّد النوفليّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Abdullah Ibn Latif Al-Taflisi
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Abdullah ibn Latif Al-Taflisi has been transmitted by me from Jafar ibn Muhammad ibn Masrur - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Al-Husayn ibn Muhammad ibn Amir, from his uncle Abdullah ibn Amir, from Muhammad ibn Abi Umayr, from Abdullah ibn Latif Al-Taflisi.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عبد اللّه بن لطيف التفليسيّ فقد رويته عن جعفر بن محمّد بن مسرور- رضي اللّه عنه- عن الحسين بن محمّد بن عامر، عن عمّه عبد اللّه بن عامر، عن محمّد بن أبي عمير، عن عبد اللّه بن لطيف التفليسيّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Ibn Abi Najran
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Ibn Abi Najran has been transmitted by me from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Sad ibn Abdullah, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Isa, from Abd Al-Rahman ibn Abi Najran.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن ابن أبي نجران فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن سعد ابن عبد اللّه، عن أحمد بن محمّد بن عيسى، عن عبد الرّحمن بن أبي نجران‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Muhammad Ibn Al-Qasim Ibn Al-Fudayl Al-Basri, Companion of Al-Ridha {a.s}
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Muhammad ibn Al-Qasim ibn Al-Fudayl Al-Basri, the companion of Al-Ridha (as), has been transmitted by me from Al-Husayn ibn Ibrahim - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Ali ibn Ibrahim, from his father, from Amr ibn Uthman, from Muhammad ibn Al-Qasim ibn Al-Fudayl Al-Basri.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن محمّد بن القاسم بن الفضيل البصريّ صاحب الرّضا عليه السلام فقد رويته عن الحسين بن إبراهيم- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عليّ بن إبراهيم، عن أبيه، عن عمرو بن عثمان، عن محمّد بن القاسم بن الفضيل البصريّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Sayf Ibn Umayrah
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Sayf ibn Umayrah has been transmitted by me from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan Al-Saffar, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Isa, from Ali ibn Sayf, from his brother Al-Husayn [ibn Sayf] from their father Sayf ibn Umayrah Al-Nakhai.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن سيف بن عميرة فقد رويته عن محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنه- عن محمّد بن الحسن الصفّار، عن أحمد بن محمّد بن عيسى، عن عليّ بن سيف، عن أخيه‌ الحسين [بن سيف‌] عن أبيه سيف بن عميرة النخعيّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Muhammad Ibn Isa
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText:
Everything in this book that is narrated from Muhammad ibn Isa has been transmitted by me from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Sad ibn Abdullah, from Muhammad ibn Isa ibn Ubayd Al-Yaqtini.
I have also narrated it from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan Al-Saffar, from Muhammad ibn Isa ibn Ubayd Al-Yaqtini.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن محمّد بن عيسى فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن سعد ابن عبد اللّه، عن محمّد بن عيسى بن عبيد اليقطينيّ. و رويته عن محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنه- عن محمّد بن الحسن الصفّار، عن محمّد بن عيسى بن عبيد اليقطينيّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Muhammad Ibn Masud Al-Ayyashi
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Muhammad ibn Masud Al-Ayyashi has been transmitted by me from Al-Muzaffar ibn Jafar ibn Al-Muzaffar Al-Alawi - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Jafar ibn Muhammad ibn Masud, from his father, Abu Al-Nadr Muhammad ibn Masud Al-Ayyashi - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن محمّد بن مسعود العيّاشيّ فقد رويته عن المظفّر بن جعفر بن المظفّر العلويّ- رضي اللّه عنه- عن جعفر بن محمّد بن مسعود، عن أبيه أبي النضر محمّد ابن مسعود العيّاشيّ- رضي اللّه عنه-.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Maymun Ibn Mihran
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Maymun ibn Mihran has been transmitted by me from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Yahya Al-Attar - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from his father, from Jafar ibn Muhammad ibn Malik, from Abu Yahya Al-Ahwazi, from Muhammad ibn Jumhur, from Al-Husayn ibn Al-Mukhtar, the seller of shrouds, from Maymun ibn Mihran.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن ميمون بن مهران فقد رويته عن أحمد بن محمّد بن يحيى العطّار- رضي اللّه عنه- عن أبيه، عن جعفر بن محمّد بن مالك، عن أبي يحيى الأهوازيّ‌ عن محمّد بن جمهور، عن الحسين بن المختار بيّاع الأكفان، عن ميمون بن مهران‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Muhammad Ibn Imran Al-Ajali
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Muhammad ibn Imran Al-Ajali has been transmitted by me from Muhammad ibn Ali Majilawayh - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from his uncle Muhammad ibn Abi Al-Qasim, from Ahmad ibn Abi Abdullah, from his father, from Muhammad ibn Abi Umayr, from Muhammad ibn Imran Al-Ajali.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن محمّد بن عمران العجليّ فقد رويته عن محمّد بن عليّ ماجيلويه- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عمّه محمّد بن أبي القاسم، عن أحمد بن أبي عبد اللّه، عن أبيه، عن محمّد بن أبي عمير، عن محمّد بن عمران العجليّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Isa Ibn Abdullah Al-Hashimi
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Isa ibn Abdullah Al-Hashimi has been transmitted by me from Muhammad ibn Musa ibn Al-Mutawakkil - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Muhammad ibn Yahya Al-Attar, from Muhammad ibn Al-Husayn ibn Abi Al-Khattab, from Muhammad ibn Abi Abdullah, from Isa ibn Abdullah ibn Ali ibn Umar ibn Ali ibn Al-Husayn ibn Ali ibn Abi Talib - peace be upon them.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عيسى بن عبد اللّه الهاشميّ فقد رويته عن محمّد بن موسى بن المتوكّل- رضي اللّه عنه- عن محمّد بن يحيى العطّار، عن محمّد بن الحسين بن أبي الخطّاب، عن محمّد بن أبي عبد اللّه، عن عيسى بن عبد اللّه بن عليّ بن عمر بن عليّ بن الحسين بن عليّ بن أبي طالب عليهم السّلام‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Abu Hammam Ismail Ibn Hammam
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Abu Hammam Ismail ibn Hammam has been transmitted by me from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Sad ibn Abdullah and Abdullah ibn Jafar Al-Himyari, all from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Isa and Ibrahim ibn Hashim, all from Abu Hammam Ismail ibn Hammam.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن أبي همّام إسماعيل بن همّام فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه؛ و عبد اللّه بن جعفر الحميريّ جميعا عن أحمد بن محمّد بن عيسى؛ و إبراهيم بن هاشم جميعا عن أبي همّام إسماعيل بن همّام‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Isa Ibn Yunus
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Isa ibn Yunus has been transmitted by me from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Ziyad ibn Jafar Al-Hamdani - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Ali ibn Ibrahim, from his father, from Muhammad ibn Sinan, from Hammad ibn Uthman, from Isa ibn Yunus.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عيسى بن يونس فقد رويته عن أحمد بن محمّد بن زياد بن جعفر الهمدانيّ- رضي اللّه عنه- عن علي بن إبراهيم، عن أبيه، عن محمّد بن سنان، عن حمّاد بن عثمان، عن عيسى بن يونس‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Hudhayfah Ibn Mansur
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Hudhayfah ibn Mansur has been transmitted by me from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Sad ibn Abdullah, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Isa, from Muhammad ibn Sinan, from Hudhayfah ibn Mansur.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن حذيفة بن منصور فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن أحمد بن محمّد بن عيسى، عن محمّد بن سنان، عن حذيفة بن منصور.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Dawud Al-Raqqi
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Dawud Al-Raqqi has been transmitted by me from Al-Husayn ibn Ahmad ibn Idris - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from his father, from Muhammad ibn Ahmad ibn Abdullah ibn Ahmad Al-Razi, from Hariz ibn Salih, from Ismail ibn Mihran, from Zakariyya ibn Adam, from Dawud ibn Kathir Al-Raqqi. It has been narrated from Al-Sadiq - peace be upon him - that he said: "Place Dawud Al-Raqqi in the same position with me as Al-Miqdad was with the Messenger of Allah (swt) - peace and blessings be upon him and his family."
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن داود الرّقّي فقد رويته عن الحسين بن أحمد بن إدريس- رضي اللّه عنه- عن أبيه، عن محمّد بن أحمد بن عبد اللّه بن أحمد الرّازيّ، عن حريز ابن صالح، عن إسماعيل بن مهران، عن زكريّا بن آدم، عن داود بن كثير الرّقّيّ‌ و روي عن الصادق عليه السّلام أنّه قال: "أنزلوا داود الرّقّيّ منّي بمنزلة المقداد من رسول اللّه صلى اللّه عليه و آله".
thaqalaynSanad: Everything in this book that is narrated from Dawud Al-Raqqi has been transmitted by me from Al-Husayn ibn Ahmad ibn Idris - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from his father, from Muhammad ibn Ahmad ibn Abdullah ibn Ahmad Al-Razi, from Hariz ibn Salih, from Ismail ibn Mihran, from Zakariyya ibn Adam, from Dawud ibn Kathir Al-Raqqi. It has been narrated from Al-Sadiq - peace be upon him - that he said:
thaqalaynMatn: "Place Dawud Al-Raqqi in the same position with me as Al-Miqdad was with the Messenger of Allah (swt) - peace and blessings be upon him and his family."

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Ishaq Ibn Burayd
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Ishaq ibn Burayd has been transmitted by me from Muhammad ibn Musa ibn Al-Mutawakkil - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Ali ibn Al-Husayn Al-Sadabadi, from Ahmad ibn Abi Abdullah Al-Barqi, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Abi Nasr Al-Bazanti, from Al-Muthanna ibn Al-Walid, from Ishaq ibn Burayd.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن إسحاق بن بريد فقد رويته عن محمّد بن موسى بن المتوكّل- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عليّ بن الحسين السعدآباديّ، عن أحمد بن أبي عبد اللّه البرقيّ عن أحمد بن محمّد بن أبي نصر البزنطيّ، عن المثنّى بن الوليد، عن إسحاق بن بريد.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Ibrahim Ibn Umar
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Ibrahim ibn Umar has been transmitted by me from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Sad ibn Abdullah, from Yaqub ibn Yazid, from Hammad ibn Isa, from Ibrahim ibn Umar Al-Yamani.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن إبراهيم بن عمر فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن يعقوب بن يزيد، عن حمّاد بن عيسى، عن إبراهيم بن عمر اليمانيّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Al-Hasan Ibn Ali Ibn Faddal
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Al-Hasan ibn Ali ibn Faddal has been transmitted by me from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Sad ibn Abdullah, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Isa, from Al-Hasan ibn Ali ibn Faddal.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن الحسن بن عليّ بن فضّال فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن أحمد بن محمّد بن عيسى، عن الحسن بن عليّ بن فضّال‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Al-Nadr Ibn Suwayd
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Al-Nadr ibn Suwayd has been transmitted by me from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan Al-Saffar, from Muhammad ibn Isa ibn Ubayd, from Al-Nadr ibn Suwayd.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن النضر بن سويد فقد رويته عن محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنه- عن محمّد بن الحسن الصفّار، عن محمّد بن عيسى بن عبيد، عن النضر بن سويد.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Shihab Ibn Abd Rabbih
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Shihab ibn Abd Rabbih has been transmitted by me from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Sad ibn Abdullah, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Isa, from Al-Hasan ibn Mahbub, from Shihab ibn Abd Rabbih.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن شهاب بن عبد ربّه فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن أحمد بن محمّد بن عيسى، عن الحسن بن محبوب، عن شهاب بن عبد ربّه‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Al-Hasan Al-Sayqal
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Al-Hasan Al-Sayqal has been transmitted by me from Muhammad ibn Musa ibn Al-Mutawakkil - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Ali ibn Al-Husayn Al-Sadabadi, from Ahmad ibn Abi Abdullah Al-Barqi, from his father, from Yunus ibn Abd Al-Rahman, from Al-Hasan ibn Ziyad Al-Sayqal Al-Kufi, whose kunyah is Abu Al-Walid, and he was a mawla.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن الحسن الصيقل فقد رويته عن محمّد بن موسى بن المتوكّل- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عليّ بن الحسين السّعدآباديّ، عن أحمد بن أبي عبد اللّه البرقيّ عن أبيه، عن يونس بن عبد الرّحمن، عن الحسن بن زياد الصيقل الكوفيّ، و كنيته أبو الوليد و هو مولى‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Amr Ibn Abi Al-Miqdam
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Amr ibn Abi Al-Miqdam has been transmitted by me from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan Al-Saffar, from Muhammad ibn Al-Husayn ibn Abi Al-Khattab, from Al-Hakam ibn Maskeen, who said: Amr ibn Abi Al-Miqdam narrated to me, and the name of Abi Al-Miqdam is Thabit ibn Hurmaz Al-Haddad.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عمرو بن أبي المقدام فقد رويته عن محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنه- عن محمّد بن الحسن الصفّار، عن محمّد بن الحسين بن أبي الخطّاب، عن الحكم ابن مسكين قال: حدّثني عمرو بن أبي المقدام، و اسم أبي المقدام ثابت بن هرمز الحدّاد.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Ibrahim Ibn Abi Yahya Al-mada'ini
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: Everything in this book that is narrated from Ibrahim ibn Abi Yahya Al-Mada'ini has been transmitted by me from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan Al-Saffar, from Muhammad ibn Abd Al-Jabbar, from Al-Hasan ibn Ali ibn Faddal, from Zharif ibn Nasih, from Ibrahim ibn Abi Yahya Al-Mada'ini.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن إبراهيم بن أبي يحيى المدائنيّ فقد رويته عن محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنه- عن محمّد بن الحسن الصفّار، عن محمّد بن عبد الجبّار، عن الحسن بن عليّ بن فضّال، عن ظريف بن ناصح، عن إبراهيم بن أبي يحيى المدائنيّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Abdul Malik Bin a'yan
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Abdul Malik bin A'yan, I have narrated it from Muhammad bin Ali Majilwayh - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from his uncle Muhammad bin Abi Al-Qasim, from Ahmad bin Abi Abdullah, from his father, from Yunus bin Abdul Rahman, from Abdul Malik bin A'yan, whose kunyah is Abu Daris. Imam Jafar ibn Muhammad Al-Sadiq (as), visited his grave in Medina with his companions.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عبد الملك بن أعين فقد رويته عن محمّد بن عليّ ماجيلويه- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عمّه محمّد بن أبي القاسم، عن أحمد بن أبي عبد اللّه، عن أبيه، عن يونس بن عبد الرّحمن، عن عبد الملك بن أعين و كنيته أبو ضريس، و زار الصادق عليه السّلام قبره بالمدينة مع أصحابه‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Ali Bin Asbat
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Ali bin Asbat, I have narrated it from Muhammad bin Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Muhammad bin Al-Hasan Al-Saffar, from Muhammad bin Al-Husayn bin Abi Al-Khattab, from Ali bin Asbat.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عليّ بن أسباط فقد رويته عن محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنه- عن محمّد بن الحسن الصفّار، عن محمّد بن الحسين بن أبي الخطّاب، عن عليّ بن أسباط.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Abu Al-rabi' Al-Shami
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Abu Al-Rabi' Al-Shami, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Sa'd bin 'Abdullah, from Muhammad bin Al-Husayn bin Abi Al-Khattab, from Al-Hakam bin Miskin, from Al-Hasan bin Ribaat, from Abu Al-Rabi' Al-Shami.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن أبي الرّبيع الشاميّ فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن محمّد بن الحسين بن أبي الخطّاب، عن الحكم بن مسكين، عن الحسن بن رباط، عن أبي الرّبيع الشاميّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Ammar Bin Marwan Al-Kalbi
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Ammar bin Marwan Al-Kalbi, I have narrated it from Muhammad bin Musa bin Al-Mutawakkil - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Abdullah bin Ja'far Al-Himyari, from Muhammad bin Al-Husayn bin Abi Al-Khattab, from Al-Hasan bin Mahbub, from Abu Ayyub Al-Khazzar, from Ammar bin Marwan.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عمّار بن مروان الكلبيّ فقد رويته عن محمّد بن موسى بن المتوكّل- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عبد اللّه بن جعفر الحميريّ، عن محمّد بن الحسين بن أبي الخطّاب عن الحسن بن محبوب، عن أبي أيّوب الخزّار، عن عمّار بن مروان‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Bakr Bin Salih
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Bakr bin Salih, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Ali bin Ibrahim bin Hashim, from his father, from Bakr bin Salih Al-Razi.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن بكر بن صالح فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عليّ بن إبراهيم بن هاشم، عن أبيه، عن بكر بن صالح الرّازيّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Ayyub Bin a'yan
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Ayyub bin A'yan, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Sa'd bin Abdullah, from Muhammad bin Al-Husayn bin Abi Al-Khattab, from Al-Hakam bin Miskin, from Ayyub bin A'yan.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن أيّوب بن أعين فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن محمّد بن الحسين بن أبي الخطّاب، عن الحكم بن مسكين، عن أيّوب بن أعين‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Mundhir Ibn Jafar
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Mundhir ibn Jafar, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Muhammad ibn Yahya Al-Attar, from Ibrahim ibn Hashim, from Abdullah ibn Al-Mughira, from Mundhir ibn Jafar.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن منذر بن جيفر فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن محمّد ابن يحيى العطّار، عن إبراهيم بن هاشم، عن عبد اللّه بن المغيرة، عن منذر بن جيفر.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Abdullah Bin Maymun
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText:
And whatever is narrated from Abdullah bin Maymun, I have narrated it from my father and Muhammad bin Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them - from Sa'd bin Abdullah, from Ibrahim bin Hashim, from Abdullah bin Maymun.
And I have also narrated it from my father, and from Muhammad bin Musa bin Al-Mutawakkil, and from Muhammad bin Ali Majilawayh - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them - from Ali bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Abdullah bin Maymun Al-Qaddah Al-Makki.
arabicText:
و ما كان فيه عن عبد اللّه بن ميمون فقد رويته عن أبي؛ و محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنهما- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن إبراهيم بن هاشم، عن عبد اللّه بن ميمون.
و رويته عن أبي؛ و محمّد بن موسى بن المتوكّل؛ و محمّد بن عليّ ماجيلويه- رضي اللّه عنهم- عن عليّ بن إبراهيم، عن أبيه، عن عبد اللّه بن ميمون القدّاح المكّيّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Jafar Bin Al-Qasim
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Jafar bin Al-Qasim, I have narrated it from my father and from Muhammad bin Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them - from Sad bin Abdullah, and from Muhammad bin Yahya, and from Ahmad bin Idris, all from Ahmad bin Abi Abdullah, from his father, from Jafar bin Al-Qasim.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن جعفر بن القاسم فقد رويته عن أبي؛ و محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنهما- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه؛ و محمّد بن يحيى؛ و أحمد بن إدريس جميعا عن أحمد بن أبي- عبد اللّه، عن أبيه، عن جعفر بن القاسم‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Mansur Al-Sayqal
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Mansur Al-Sayqal, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Sad bin Abdullah, from Muhammad bin Abd Al-Jabbar, from Abu Muhammad Al-Dhahili, from Ibrahim bin Khalid Al-Attar, from Muhammad bin Mansur Al-Sayqal, from his father Mansur Al-Sayqal.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن منصور الصيقل فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن محمّد بن عبد الجبّار، عن أبي محمّد الذّهليّ، عن إبراهيم بن خالد العطّار عن محمّد بن منصور الصيقل، عن أبيه منصور الصيقل‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Ali Ibn Maysarah
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Ali ibn Maysarah, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Sad ibn Abdullah, from Muhammad ibn Isa, from Al-Hasan ibn Ali Al-Washsha', from Ali ibn Maysarah.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عليّ بن ميسرة فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن محمّد بن عيسى، عن الحسن بن عليّ الوشّاء، عن عليّ بن ميسرة.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Muhammad Ibn Al-Qasim Al-Astarabadi
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Muhammad ibn Al-Qasim Al-Astarabadi, I have narrated it from him.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن محمّد بن القاسم الأسترآباديّ فقد رويته عنه‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Hammad Al-nawwa'
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Hammad Al-Nawwa', I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Ali Al-Majilawayh - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him -  from his uncle Muhammad ibn Abi Al-Qasim, from his father, from Muhammad ibn Khalid Al-Barqi, from Muhammad ibn Sinan, from Ibn Muskan, from Hammad Al-Nawwa'.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن حمّاد النوّاء فقد رويته عن محمّد بن عليّ ماجيلويه- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عمّه محمّد بن أبي القاسم، عن أبيه، عن محمّد بن خالد البرقيّ، عن محمّد بن‌ سنان، عن ابن مسكان، عن حمّاد النوّاء.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Khalid Ibn Abi Al-ala' Al-Khuffaf
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Khalid ibn Abi Al-Ala' Al-Khuffaf, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him -  from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan Al-Saffar, from Ya'qub ibn Yazid, from Muhammad ibn Abi Umayr, from Khalid ibn Abi Al-Ala' Al-Khuffaf.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن خالد بن أبي العلاء الخفّاف فقد رويته عن محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنه- عن محمّد بن الحسن الصفّار، عن يعقوب بن يزيد، عن محمّد بن أبي- عمير، عن خالد بن أبي العلاء الخفّاف‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Al-Kahili
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Al-Kahili, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him -  from Sad ibn Abdullah, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Isa, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Abi Nasr Al-Bazanti, from Abdullah ibn Yahya Al-Kahili.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن الكاهليّ فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن أحمد بن محمّد بن عيسى، عن أحمد بن محمّد بن أبي نصر البزنطيّ، عن عبد اللّه ابن يحيى الكاهليّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Ismail Ibn Al-Fadl
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Ismail ibn Al-Fadl, I have narrated it from Jafar ibn Muhammad ibn Masrur - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him -  from Al-Husayn ibn Muhammad ibn Amir, from his uncle Abdullah ibn Amir, from Muhammad ibn Abi Umayr, from Abd Al-Rahman ibn Muhammad, from Al-Fadl ibn Ismail ibn Al-Fadl, from his father Ismail ibn Al-Fadl Al-Hashimi.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن إسماعيل بن الفضل فقد رويته عن جعفر بن محمّد بن مسرور- رضي اللّه عنه- عن الحسين بن محمّد بن عامر، عن عمّه عبد اللّه بن عامر، عن محمّد بن أبي عمير، عن عبد الرّحمن بن محمّد، عن الفضل بن إسماعيل بن الفضل، عن أبيه إسماعيل ابن الفضل الهاشميّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Abu Al-Hasan Al-Nahdi
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Abu Al-Hasan Al-Nahdi, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him -  from Sad ibn Abdullah, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Isa, from Al-Hasan ibn Ali Al-Washsha', from Abu Al-Hasan Al-Nahdi.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن أبي الحسن النهديّ فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن أحمد بن محمّد بن عيسى، عن الحسن بن عليّ الوشّاء، عن أبي الحسن النهديّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Imran Al-Halabi
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Imran Al-Halabi, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him -  from Sad ibn Abdullah, from Muhammad ibn Al-Husayn ibn Abi Al-Khattab, from Jafar ibn Bashir, from Hammad ibn Uthman, from Imran Al-Halabi, whose kunyah is Abu Al-Fadl.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عمران الحلبيّ فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن محمّد بن الحسين بن أبي الخطّاب، عن جعفر بن بشير، عن حمّاد بن عثمان عن عمران الحلبيّ، و كنيته أبو الفضل‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Al-Hasan Ibn Harun
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Al-Hasan ibn Harun, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him -  from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan Al-Saffar, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Isa, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Abi Nasr Al-Bazanti, from Abdul-Karim ibn Amr, from Al-Hasan ibn Harun.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن الحسن بن هارون فقد رويته عن محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنه- عن محمّد بن الحسن الصفّار، عن أحمد بن محمّد بن عيسى، عن أحمد بن محمّد بن أبي نصر البزنطيّ، عن عبد الكريم بن عمرو، عن الحسن بن هارون‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Ibrahim Ibn Sufyan
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Ibrahim ibn Sufyan, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Ali Ma'jilawayh - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him -  from his uncle Muhammad ibn Abi Al-Qasim, from Muhammad ibn Ali Al-Kufi, from Muhammad ibn Sinan, from Ibrahim ibn Sufyan.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن إبراهيم بن سفيان فقد رويته عن محمّد بن عليّ ماجيلويه- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عمّه محمّد بن أبي القاسم، عن محمّد بن عليّ الكوفيّ، عن محمّد بن سنان عن إبراهيم بن سفيان‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Al-Husayn Ibn Salim
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Al-Husayn ibn Salim, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him -  from Sa'd ibn Abdullah, from Muhammad ibn Al-Husayn ibn Abi Al-Khattab, from Abdullah ibn Jiblah, from Abu Abdullah Al-Khurasani, from Al-Husayn ibn Salim.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن الحسين بن سالم فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن محمّد بن الحسين بن أبي الخطّاب، عن عبد اللّه بن جبلة، عن‌ أبي عبد اللّه الخراسانيّ، عن الحسين بن سالم‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Yusuf Al-Tatri
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Yusuf Al-Tatri, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him -  from Sa'd ibn Abdullah, from Ibrahim ibn Hashim, from Muhammad ibn Sinan, from Yusuf ibn Ibrahim Al-Tatri.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن يوسف الطاطريّ فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن إبراهيم بن هاشم، عن محمّد بن سنان، عن يوسف بن إبراهيم الطاطريّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Fadala Ibn Ayyub
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Fadala ibn Ayyub, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) have mercy on him -  from Sa'd ibn Abdullah, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Isa, from Al-Husayn ibn Sa'id, from Fadala ibn Ayyub. And I have also narrated it from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him -  from Al-Husayn ibn Al-Hasan ibn Aban, from Al-Husayn ibn Sa'id, from Fadala ibn Ayyub.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن فضالة بن أيّوب فقد رويته عن أبي- رحمه اللّه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن أحمد بن محمّد بن عيسى، عن الحسين بن سعيد، عن فضالة بن أيّوب. و رويته عن محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنه- عن الحسين بن الحسن بن أبان، عن الحسين بن سعيد، عن فضالة بن أيّوب‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Yahya Al-Azraq
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Yahya Al-Azraq, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him -  from Ali ibn Ibrahim ibn Hashim, from his father, from Muhammad ibn Abi Umayr, from Aban ibn Uthman, from Yahya ibn Hassan Al-Azraq.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن يحيى الأزرق فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عليّ ابن إبراهيم بن هاشم، عن أبيه، عن محمّد بن أبي عمير، عن أبان بن عثمان، عن يحيى ابن حسّان الأزرق‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Ali Ibn Al-Numan
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Ali ibn Al-Numan, I have narrated it from my father and Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them both - through Sa'd ibn Abdullah, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Isa, and Ibrahim ibn Hashim, all from Ali ibn Al-Numan.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عليّ بن النعمان فقد رويته عن أبي؛ و محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنهما- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن أحمد بن محمّد بن عيسى؛ و إبراهيم بن هاشم جميعا عن عليّ بن النعمان‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Ahmad Ibn Muhammad Ibn Mutahhar, Companion of Abu Muhammad, Peace Be Upon Him
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Mutahhar, the companion of Abu Muhammad, peace be upon him, I have narrated it from my father and Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them both - through Sa'd ibn Abdullah and Abdullah ibn Jafar Al-Himyari, all from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Mutahhar, the companion of Abu Muhammad, peace be upon him.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن أحمد بن محمّد بن مطهّر صاحب أبي محمّد عليه السّلام فقد رويته عن أبي؛ و محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنهما- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه؛ و عبد اللّه بن جعفر الحميريّ جميعا عن أحمد بن محمّد بن مطهّر صاحب أبي محمّد عليه السّلام‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Abu Abdullah Al-Khurasani
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Abu Abdullah Al-Khurasani, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - through Sa'd ibn Abdullah, from Ibrahim ibn Hashim, from Abu Abdullah Al-Khurasani.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن أبي عبد اللّه الخراسانيّ فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن إبراهيم بن هاشم، عن أبي عبد اللّه الخراسانيّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Harith the Seller of Carpets
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Harith the seller of carpets, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Ali Al-Majilawayh - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - through Ali ibn Ibrahim ibn Hashim, from his father, from Muhammad ibn Sinan, from Harith the seller of carpets.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن حارث بيّاع الأنماط فقد رويته عن محمّد بن علي ماجيلويه- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عليّ بن إبراهيم بن هاشم، عن أبيه، عن محمّد بن سنان، عن حارث بيّاع الأنماط.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Amr Ibn sa'id Al-Sabati
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Amr ibn Sa'id Al-Sabati, I have narrated it from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Yahya Al-Attar - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Sa'd ibn 'Abdullah, from Ahmad ibn Al-Hasan ibn 'Ali ibn Faddal, from Amr ibn Sa'id Al-Sabati.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عمرو بن سعيد السّاباطيّ فقد رويته عن أحمد بن محمّد بن يحيى العطّار- رضي اللّه عنه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن أحمد بن الحسن بن عليّ بن فضّال‌ عن عمرو بن سعيد الساباطيّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Ali Ibn Muhammad Al-Husayni
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Ali ibn Muhammad Al-Husayni, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Ali Majilawayh - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from his uncle Muhammad ibn Abi Al-Qasim, from Muhammad ibn Ali Al-Kufi, from Muhammad ibn Sinan, from Ali ibn Muhammad Al-Husayni.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عليّ بن محمّد الحصينيّ فقد رويته عن محمّد بن عليّ ماجيلويه- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عمّه محمّد بن أبي القاسم، عن محمّد بن عليّ الكوفيّ، عن محمّد بن سنان، عن عليّ بن محمّد الحصينيّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Suwayd Al-qallaʾ
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Suwayd Al-Qallaʾ, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) have mercy on him - from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan Al-Saffar and Al-Hasan ibn Matil, from Muhammad ibn Al-Husayn ibn Abi Al-Khaṭṭab, from Ali ibn Al-Nuʿman, from Suwayd Al-Qallaʾ.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن سويد القلّاء فقد رويته عن محمّد بن الحسن- رحمه اللّه- عن محمّد بن الحسن الصفّار؛ و الحسن بن متّيل، عن محمّد بن الحسين بن أبي الخطّاب، عن عليّ بن النعمان، عن سويد القلّاء.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Muthanna Ibn Abd Al-Salam
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Muthanna ibn Abd Al-Salam, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan Al-Ṣaffar, from Muawiyah ibn Hakim, from Abdullah ibn Al-Mughirah, from Muthanna ibn Abd Al-Salam.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن مثنّى بن عبد السلام فقد رويته عن محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنه- عن محمّد بن الحسن الصفّار، عن معاوية بن حكيم، عن عبد اللّه بن المغيرة، عن مثنّى بن عبد السلام‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Jafar Ibn Najjiyah
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Jafar ibn Najjiyah, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Al-Hasan ibn Matil Al-Daqqaq, from Muhammad ibn Al-Husayn ibn Abi Al-Khaṭṭab, from Jafar ibn Bishr Al-Bajali, from Jafar ibn Najjiyah.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن جعفر بن ناجية فقد رويته عن محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنه- عن الحسن بن متّيل الدّقّاق، عن محمّد بن الحسين بن أبي الخطّاب، عن جعفر بن بشير البجليّ، عن جعفر بن ناجية.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Dhurayh Al-Muharibi
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Dhurayh Al-Muharibi, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Ali ibn Ibrahim, from his father, from Muhammad ibn Abi Umayr, from Dhurayh ibn Yazid ibn Muhammad Al-Muharibi. And I have also narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Ali ibn Ibrahim, from his father, from Al-Hasan ibn Mahbub, from Ṣalih ibn Razin, from Dhurayh.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن ذريح المحاربيّ فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عليّ بن إبراهيم، عن أبيه، عن محمّد بن أبي عمير، عن ذريح بن يزيد بن محمّد المحاربيّ، و رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عليّ بن إبراهيم، عن أبيه، عن الحسن بن محبوب عن صالح بن رزين، عن ذريح‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Kulayb Al-Asadi
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Kulayb Al-Asadi, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Sad ibn Abdullah, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Isa, from Muhammad ibn Khalid, from Faḍalah ibn Ayyub, from Kulayb ibn Muawiyah Al-Asadi Al-Ṣaydawi.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه، عن كليب الأسديّ فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن أحمد بن محمّد بن عيسى، عن محمّد بن خالد، عن فضالة بن أيّوب، عن كليب بن معاوية الأسديّ الصيداويّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Abdullah Ibn Jafar Al-Himyari
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Abdullah ibn Jafar Al-Himyari, I have narrated it from my father, and from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan, and from Muhammad ibn Musa ibn Al-Mutawakkil - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them - from Abdullah ibn Jafar ibn Jamiʿ Al-Himyari.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عبد اللّه بن جعفر الحميريّ فقد رويته عن أبي؛ و محمّد بن الحسن؛ و محمّد بن موسى بن المتوكّل- رضي اللّه عنهم- عن عبد اللّه بن جعفر بن جامع الحميريّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Muhammad Ibn Uthman Al-Amri
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Muhammad ibn Uthman Al-Amri - may Allah (swt) sanctify his soul - I have narrated it from my father, and from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan, and from Muhammad ibn Musa ibn Al-Mutawakkil - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them - from Abdullah ibn Jafar Al-Himyari, from Muhammad ibn Uthman Al-Amri - may Allah (swt) sanctify his soul.
arabicText: ما كان فيه عن محمّد بن عثمان العمريّ- قدّس اللّه روحه- فقد رويته عن أبي؛ و محمّد بن الحسن؛ و محمّد بن موسى بن المتوكّل- رضي اللّه عنهم- عن عبد اللّه بن جعفر الحميريّ، عن محمّد بن عثمان العمريّ [قدّس اللّه روحه‌].

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to ṣalih Ibn Uqbah
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Ṣalih ibn Uqbah, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Musa ibn Al-Mutawakkil - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Ali ibn Al-Husayn Al-Saʿdaʾbadi, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Khalid, from his father, from Muhammad ibn Sinan and Yunus ibn Abd Al-Rahman together, from Ṣalih ibn Uqbah ibn Qays ibn Saman ibn Abi Rabihah, the freed slave of the Messenger of Allah (swt), peace and blessings be upon him and his family.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن صالح بن عقبة فقد رويته عن محمّد بن موسى بن المتوكّل- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عليّ بن الحسين السعدآباديّ، عن أحمد بن محمّد بن خالد، عن أبيه، عن محمّد بن سنان؛ و يونس بن عبد الرّحمن جميعا عن صالح بن عقبة بن قيس بن سمعان بن أبي ربيحة مولى رسول اللّه صلّى اللّه عليه و آله‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Al-Husayn Ibn Muhammad Al-Qummi
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Al-Husayn ibn Muhammad Al-Qummi, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Ali Majilawayh - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Ali ibn Ibrahim ibn Hashim, from his father, from Al-Husayn ibn Muhammad Al-Qummi, from Al-Riḍa, peace be upon him.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن الحسين بن محمّد القميّ فقد رويته عن محمّد بن عليّ ماجيلويه- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عليّ بن إبراهيم بن هاشم، عن أبيه، عن الحسين بن محمّد القميّ عن الرّضا عليه السّلام‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Al-Husayn Ibn Zayd
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Al-Husayn ibn Zayd, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Ali Majilawayh - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Muhammad ibn Yahya Al-Aṭṭar, from Ayyub ibn Nuh, from Muhammad ibn Abi Umayr, from Al-Husayn ibn Zayd ibn Ali ibn Al-Husayn ibn Ali ibn Abi Ṭalib, peace be upon them.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن الحسين بن زيد فقد رويته عن محمّد بن عليّ ماجيلويه- رضي اللّه عنه- عن محمّد بن يحيى العطّار، عن أيّوب بن نوح، عن محمّد بن أبي عمير، عن الحسين بن زيد بن عليّ بن الحسين بن عليّ بن أبي طالب عليهم السّلام‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Al-nuʿman Ibn saʿd, the Companion of Amir Al-muʾminin, Peace Be Upon Him
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Al-Nuʿman ibn Saʿd, the companion of Amir Al-Muʾminin, peace be upon him, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Musa ibn Al-Mutawakkil - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Ali ibn Al-Husayn Al-Saʿdaʾbadi, from Ahmad ibn Abi Abdillah Al-Barqi, from his father, from Muhammad ibn Sinan, from Thabit ibn Abi Ṣafiyyah, from Saʿid ibn Jubayr, from Al-Nuʿman ibn Saʿd.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن النعمان بن سعد صاحب أمير المؤمنين عليه السّلام فقد حدّثني به محمّد ابن موسى بن المتوكّل- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عليّ بن الحسين السعدآبادي، عن أحمد بن أبي عبد اللّه البرقيّ، عن أبيه، عن محمّد بن سنان، عن ثابت بن أبي صفيّة، عن سعيد بن‌ جبير، عن النعمان بن سعد.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Hamdan Al-Diwani
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Hamdan Al-Diwani, I have narrated it from Ahmad ibn Ziyad ibn Jafar Al-Hamadani - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Ali ibn Ibrahim ibn Hashim, from his father, from Hamdan Al-Diwani.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن حمدان الدّيوانيّ فقد رويته عن أحمد بن زياد بن جعفر الهمدانيّ- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عليّ بن إبراهيم بن هاشم، عن أبيه، عن حمدان الدّيوانيّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Hamzah Ibn Himran
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Hamzah ibn Himran, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan Al-Ṣaffar, from Yaʿqub ibn Yazid, from Muhammad ibn Abi Umayr, from Hamzah ibn Himran ibn Aʿyan, the freed slave of Banu Shayban Al-Kufi.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن حمزة بن حمران فقد رويته عن محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنه- عن محمّد بن الحسن الصفّار، عن يعقوب بن يزيد، عن محمّد بن أبي عمير، عن حمزة بن حمران بن أعين مولى بني شيبان الكوفيّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Muhammad Ibn ismaʿil Al-Barmaki
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Muhammad ibn Ismaʿil Al-Barmaki, I have narrated it from Ali ibn Ahmad ibn Musa, and Muhammad ibn Ahmad Al-Sanani, and Al-Husayn ibn Ibrahim ibn Ahmad ibn Hisham Al-Maktab - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them - from Muhammad ibn Abi Abdillah Al-Kufi, from Muhammad ibn Ismaʿil Al-Barmaki.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن محمّد بن إسماعيل البرمكيّ فقد رويته عن عليّ بن أحمد بن موسى؛ و محمّد بن أحمد السنانيّ؛ و الحسين بن إبراهيم بن أحمد بن هشام المكتّب- رضي اللّه عنهم- عن محمّد بن أبي عبد اللّه الكوفيّ، عن محمّد بن إسماعيل البرمكيّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to ismaʿil Ibn Al-faḍl Regarding the Mention of Rights From Ali Ibn Al-Husayn, Sayyid Al-Abidin, Peace Be Upon Them
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Ismaʿil ibn Al-Faḍl regarding the mention of rights from Ali ibn Al-Husayn, Sayyid Al-Abidin, peace be upon them, I have narrated it from Ali ibn Ahmad ibn Musa - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - who said: Muhammad ibn Jafar Al-Kufi Al-Asadi narrated to us, who said: Muhammad ibn Ismaʿil Al-Barmaki narrated to us, who said: Abdullah ibn Ahmad narrated to us, who said: Ismaʿil ibn Al-Faḍl narrated to us, from Thabit ibn Dinar Al-Thumali, from Sayyid Al-Abidin, Ali ibn Al-Husayn ibn Ali ibn Abi Ṭalib, peace be upon them.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن إسماعيل بن الفضل من ذكر الحقوق عن عليّ بن الحسين سيّد العابدين عليهما السّلام فقد رويته عن عليّ بن أحمد بن موسى- رضي اللّه عنه- قال: حدّثنا محمّد بن جعفر الكوفيّ الأسديّ قال: حدّثنا محمّد بن إسماعيل البرمكيّ قال: حدّثنا عبد اللّه بن أحمد قال: حدّثنا إسماعيل بن الفضل، عن ثابت بن دينار الثماليّ عن سيّد العابدين عليّ بن الحسين بن عليّ بن أبي طالب عليهم السّلام‌.
thaqalaynSanad: And whatever is narrated from Ismaʿil ibn Al-Faḍl regarding the mention of rights from Ali ibn Al-Husayn, Sayyid Al-Abidin, peace be upon them, I have narrated it from Ali ibn Ahmad ibn Musa - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - who said: Muhammad ibn Jafar Al-Kufi Al-Asadi narrated to us, who said: Muhammad ibn Ismaʿil Al-Barmaki narrated to us, who said: Abdullah ibn Ahmad narrated to us, who said: Ismaʿil ibn Al-Faḍl narrated to us,
thaqalaynMatn: from Thabit ibn Dinar Al-Thumali, from Sayyid Al-Abidin, Ali ibn Al-Husayn ibn Ali ibn Abi Ṭalib, peace be upon them.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain for the Will of Amir Al-muʾminin, Peace Be Upon Him, to His Son Muhammad Ibn Al-Hanafiyyah
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated regarding the will of Amir Al-Muʾminin, peace be upon him, to his son Muhammad ibn Al-Hanafiyyah - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Ali ibn Ibrahim ibn Hashim, from his father, from Hammad ibn ʿIsa, from someone who mentioned it from Abu Abdillah, peace be upon him. Most people make an error in this chain of transmission by replacing Hammad ibn ʿIsa with Hammad ibn Uthman, whereas Ibrahim ibn Hashim did not meet Hammad ibn Uthman; rather, he met Hammad ibn ʿIsa and narrated from him.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه من وصيّة أمير المؤمنين عليه السّلام لابنه محمّد بن الحنفيّة- رضي اللّه عنه- فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عليّ بن إبراهيم بن هاشم، عن أبيه عن حمّاد بن عيسى، عمّن ذكره عن أبي عبد اللّه عليه السّلام، و يغلط أكثر النّاس في هذا الاسناد فيجعلون مكان حمّاد بن عيسى حمّاد بن عثمان، و إبراهيم بن هاشم لم يلق حمّاد بن عثمان و إنّما لقي حمّاد بن عيسى و روى عنه‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to aṭaʾ Ibn Al-saʾib
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Aṭaʾ ibn Al-Saʾib, I have narrated it from Al-Husayn ibn Ahmad ibn Idris - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from his father, from Muhammad ibn Abi Al-Ṣuhban, from Abu Ahmad Muhammad ibn Ziyad Al-Azdi, from Aban Al-Ahmar, from Aṭaʾ ibn Al-Saʾib.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عطاء بن السّائب فقد رويته عن الحسين بن أحمد بن إدريس- رضي اللّه عنه- عن أبيه، عن محمّد بن أبي الصهبان، عن أبي أحمد محمّد بن زياد الأزديّ‌ عن أبان الأحمر، عن عطاء بن السّائب‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Ahmad Ibn aʾidh
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Ahmad ibn Aʾidh, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Saʿd ibn Abdullah, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn ʿIsa, from Al-Hasan ibn Ali Al-Washshaʾ, from Ahmad ibn Aʾidh.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن أحمد بن عائذ فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن أحمد بن محمّد عيسى، عن الحسن بن عليّ الوشّاء، عن أحمد بن عائذ.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Ibrahim Ibn Muhammad Al-Thaqafi
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Ibrahim ibn Muhammad Al-Thaqafi, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Abdullah ibn Al-Husayn Al-Muʾaddib, from Ahmad ibn Ali Al-Aṣbahani, from Ibrahim ibn Muhammad Al-Thaqafi. And I have also narrated it from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Ahmad ibn Alawiyyah Al-Aṣbahani, from Ibrahim ibn Muhammad Al-Thaqafi.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن إبراهيم بن محمّد الثقفيّ فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عبد اللّه بن الحسين المؤدّب، عن أحمد بن عليّ الأصبهانيّ‌، عن إبراهيم بن محمّد الثقفيّ. و رويته عن محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنه- عن أحمد بن علويّة الأصبهانيّ، عن إبراهيم بن محمّد الثقفيّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Amr Ibn Thabit
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Amr ibn Thabit, who is Amr ibn Abi Al-Miqdam, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan Al-Ṣaffar and Al-Hasan ibn Matil together, from Muhammad ibn Al-Husayn ibn Abi Al-Khaṭṭab, from Al-Hakam ibn Miskin, from Amr ibn Thabit Abi Al-Miqdam.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عمرو بن ثابت، و هو عمرو بن أبي المقدام فقد رويته عن محمّد ابن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنه- عن محمّد بن الحسن الصفّار؛ و الحسن بن متّيل جميعا عن محمّد بن الحسين بن أبي الخطّاب، عن الحكم بن مسكين، عن عمرو بن ثابت أبي المقدام‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Al-alaʾ Ibn Siyabah
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Al-Alaʾ ibn Siyabah, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Saʿd ibn Abdullah, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn ʿIsa, from Al-Hasan ibn Ali Al-Washshaʾ, from Aban ibn Uthman, from Al-Alaʾ ibn Siyabah.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن العلاء بن سيابة فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن سعد ابن عبد اللّه، عن أحمد بن محمّد بن عيسى، عن الحسن بن عليّ الوشّاء، عن أبان بن عثمان عن العلاء بن سيابة.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Abdullah Ibn Al-Hakam
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Abdullah ibn Al-Hakam, I have narrated it from Al-Husayn ibn Ahmad ibn Idris - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from his father, from Muhammad ibn Ahmad ibn Yahya, from Sahl ibn Ziyad Al-Adami, from Al-Jariri, whose name is Sufyan, from Abu ʿImran Al-Armani, from Abdullah ibn Al-Hakam. And I have also narrated it from my father and from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them - from Ahmad ibn Idris, from Muhammad ibn Hassan, from Abu ʿImran Musa ibn Zanjawayh Al-Armani, from Abdullah ibn Al-Hakam.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عبد اللّه بن الحكم فقد رويته عن الحسين بن أحمد بن إدريس- رضي اللّه عنه- عن أبيه، عن محمّد بن أحمد بن يحيى، عن سهل بن زياد الآدميّ عن الجريريّ و اسمه سفيان، عن أبي عمران الأرمنيّ، عن عبد اللّه بن الحكم. و رويته عن أبي؛ و محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنهما- عن أحمد بن إدريس، عن محمّد بن حسّان، عن أبي عمران موسى بن زنجويه الأرمنيّ، عن عبد اللّه بن الحكم‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Ali Ibn Ahmad Ibn Ashim
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText:
And whatever is narrated from Ali ibn Ahmad ibn Ashim, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Ali Majilawayh - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from his uncle Muhammad ibn Abi Al-Qasim, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Khalid, from Ali ibn Ahmad ibn Ashim.
[Clarification of the transmission chain to Ali ibn Maṭar]
بيان الطريق إلى عليّ بن مطر
ضعیف
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عليّ بن أحمد بن أشيم فقد رويته عن محمّد بن عليّ ماجيلويه- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عمّه محمّد بن أبي القاسم، عن أحمد بن محمّد بن خالد، عن عليّ بن أحمد بن أشيم‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Ali Ibn Ahmad Ibn Ashim
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Ali ibn Maṭar, I have narrated it from Ahmad ibn Ziyad ibn Jafar Al-Hamadani - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Ali ibn Ibrahim ibn Hashim, from his father, from Muhammad ibn Sinan, from Ali ibn Maṭar.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عليّ بن مطر فقد رويته عن أحمد بن زياد بن جعفر الهمدانيّ- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عليّ بن إبراهيم بن هاشم، عن أبيه، عن محمّد بن سنان، عن عليّ بن مطر.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Yasin Al-ḍarir
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Yasin Al-Ḍarir, I have narrated it from my father and from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them - who both said: Saʿd ibn Abdullah and Abdullah ibn Jafar Al-Himyari together narrated to us, from Muhammad ibn ʿIsa ibn Ubayd, from Yasin Al-Ḍarir Al-Baṣri.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن ياسين الضرير فقد رويته عن أبي، و محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنهما- قالا: حدّثنا سعد بن عبد اللّه؛ و عبد اللّه بن جعفر الحميريّ جميعا عن محمّد بن عيسى بن عبيد، عن ياسين الضّرير البصريّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Ali Ibn Ghurab
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Ali ibn Ghurab, I have narrated it from my father and from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them - from Ahmad ibn Idris, from Muhammad ibn Hassan, from Idris ibn Al-Hasan, from Ali ibn Ghurab, who is the son of Abu Al-Mughirah Al-Azdi.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عليّ بن غراب فقد رويته عن أبي، و محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنهما- عن أحمد بن إدريس، عن محمّد بن حسّان، عن إدريس بن الحسن، عن عليّ بن غراب، و هو ابن أبي المغيرة الأزديّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Al-Qasim Ibn Burayd
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Al-Qasim ibn Burayd, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Musa ibn Al-Mutawakkil - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Ali ibn Al-Husayn Al-Saʿdaʾbadi, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Khalid, from his father, from Muhammad ibn Sinan, from Al-Qasim ibn Burayd ibn Muawiyah Al-Ajli.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن القاسم بن بريد فقد رويته عن محمّد بن موسى بن المتوكّل- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عليّ بن الحسين السعدآباديّ، عن أحمد بن محمّد بن خالد، عن أبيه، عن محمّد بن سنان، عن القاسم بن بريد بن معاوية العجليّ‌.
thaqalaynMatn: from Al-Qasim ibn Burayd, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Musa ibn Al-Mutawakkil - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Ali ibn Al-Husayn Al-Saʿdaʾbadi, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Khalid, from his father, from Muhammad ibn Sinan, from Al-Qasim ibn Burayd ibn Muawiyah Al-Ajli.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Ahmad Ibn Hilal
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Ahmad ibn Hilal, I have narrated it from my father and from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them - from Saʿd ibn Abdullah, from Ahmad ibn Hilal.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن أحمد بن هلال فقد رويته عن أبي؛ و محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنهما- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن أحمد بن هلال‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Abu Hashim Al-Jafari
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Abu Hashim Al-Jafari, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Musa ibn Al-Mutawakkil - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Ali ibn Al-Husayn Al-Saʿdaʾbadi, from Ahmad ibn Abi Abdillah Al-Barqi, from Abu Hashim Al-Jafari.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن أبي هاشم الجعفريّ فقد رويته عن محمّد بن موسى بن المتوكّل- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عليّ بن الحسين السعدآباديّ، عن أحمد بن أبي عبد اللّه البرقيّ، عن أبي هاشم الجعفريّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Ali Ibn Abd Al-Aziz
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Ali ibn Abd Al-Aziz, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Saʿd ibn Abdullah, from Ahmad ibn Abi Abdillah Al-Barqi, from his father, from Hamzah ibn Abdullah, from Ishaq ibn Ammar, from Ali ibn Abd Al-Aziz.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عليّ بن عبد العزيز فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن أحمد بن أبي عبد اللّه البرقيّ، عن أبيه، عن حمزة بن عبد اللّه، عن إسحاق بن عمّار، عن عليّ بن عبد العزيز.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Muhammad Ibn Adhafar
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Muhammad ibn Adhafar, I have narrated it from my father and from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them - from Saʿd ibn Abdullah and Al-Himyari together, from Muhammad ibn Al-Husayn ibn Abi Al-Khaṭṭab, from Muhammad ibn Ismaʿil ibn Baziʿ, from Muhammad ibn Adhafar Al-Ṣayrafi.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن محمّد بن عذافر فقد رويته عن أبي؛ و محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنهما- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه؛ و الحميريّ جميعا عن محمّد بن الحسين بن أبي الخطّاب عن محمّد بن إسماعيل بن بزيع، عن محمّد بن عذافر الصيرفيّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Sadir Al-ṣayrafi
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Sadir Al-Ṣayrafi, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Saʿd ibn Abdullah, from Muhammad ibn Al-Husayn ibn Abi Al-Khaṭṭab, from Al-Hakam ibn Miskin, from Amr ibn Abi Naṣr Al-Anmaṭi, from Sadir ibn Hakim ibn Ṣuhayb Al-Ṣayrafi, who was known by the kunyah Abu Al-Faḍl.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن سدير الصيرفيّ فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن سعد ابن عبد اللّه، عن محمّد بن الحسين بن أبي الخطّاب، عن الحكم بن مسكين، عن عمرو ابن أبي نصر الأنماطيّ، عن سدير بن حكيم بن صهيب الصيرفيّ و يكنّى أبا الفضل‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Ayyub Ibn Al-Harr
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Ayyub ibn Al-Harr, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan Al-Ṣaffar, from Ahmad ibn Abi Abdillah Al-Barqi, from his father, from Al-Naḍr ibn Suwayd, from Yahya Al-Halabi, from Ayyub ibn Al-Harr Al-Juʿfi Al-Kufi, the brother of Adim ibn Al-Harr, and he was a freed slave.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن أيّوب بن الحرّ فقد رويته عن محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنه- عن محمّد بن الحسن الصفّار، عن أحمد بن أبي عبد اللّه البرقيّ، عن أبيه، عن النضر بن سويد، عن يحيى الحلبيّ، عن أيّوب بن الحرّ الجعفيّ الكوفيّ أخي أديم بن الحرّ و هو مولى‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Al-Hasan Ibn Ali Ibn Abi Hamzah
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Al-Hasan ibn Ali ibn Abi Hamzah, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Ali Majilawayh - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from his uncle Muhammad ibn Abi Al-Qasim, from Muhammad ibn Ali Al-Ṣayrafi, from Ismaʿil ibn Mihran, from Al-Hasan ibn Ali ibn Abi Hamzah Al-Baṭaʾini.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن الحسن بن عليّ بن أبي حمزة فقد رويته عن محمّد بن عليّ ماجيلويه- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عمّه محمّد بن أبي القاسم، عن محمّد بن عليّ الصيرفيّ، عن إسماعيل بن مهران، عن الحسن بن عليّ بن أبي حمزة البطائنيّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Al-faḍl Ibn Abi Qurrah Al-Samandi Al-Kufi
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Al-Faḍl ibn Abi Qurrah Al-Samandi Al-Kufi, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Musa ibn Al-Mutawakkil - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Ali ibn Al-Husayn Al-Saʿdaʾbadi, from Ahmad ibn Abi Abdillah Al-Barqi, from Sharif ibn Sabiq Al-Tiflisi, from Al-Faḍl ibn Abi Qurrah Al-Samandi Al-Kufi.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن الفضل بن أبي قرّة السمنديّ الكوفيّ فقد رويته عن محمّد بن موسى بن المتوكّل- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عليّ بن الحسين السعدآباديّ، عن أحمد بن‌ أبي عبد اللّه البرقيّ، عن شريف بن سابق التفليسيّ، عن الفضل بن أبي قرّة السّمنديّ الكوفيّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Abd Al-Hamid Ibn awaḍ Al-ṭaʾi
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Abd Al-Hamid ibn Awaḍ Al-Ṭaʾi, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Muhammad ibn Yahya Al-Aṭṭar, from Muhammad ibn Ahmad, from ʿImran ibn Musa, from Al-Hasan ibn Ali ibn Al-Nuʿman, from his father, from Abd Al-Hamid ibn Awaḍ Al-Ṭaʾi.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عبد الحميد بن عوّاض الطائيّ فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن محمّد بن يحيى العطّار، عن محمّد بن أحمد، عن عمران بن موسى، عن الحسن بن عليّ بن النعمان، عن أبيه، عن عبد الحميد بن عوّاض الطّائيّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Abd Al-ṣamad Ibn Bashir
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Abd Al-Ṣamad ibn Bashir, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Al-Hasan ibn Matil Al-Daqqaq, from Muhammad ibn Al-Husayn ibn Abi Al-Khaṭṭab, from Jafar ibn Bashir, from Abd Al-Ṣamad ibn Bashir Al-Kufi.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عبد الصمد بن بشير فقد رويته عن محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنه- عن الحسن بن متّيل الدّقّاق، عن محمّد بن الحسين بن أبي الخطّاب، عن جعفر ابن بشير، عن عبد الصمد بن بشير الكوفيّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Abdullah Ibn Muhammad Al-juʿfi
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Abdullah ibn Muhammad Al-Juʿfi, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Saʿd ibn Abdullah, from Muhammad ibn Al-Husayn ibn Abi Al-Khaṭṭab, from Jafar ibn Bashir, from Abdullah ibn Muhammad Al-Juʿfi.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عبد اللّه بن محمّد الجعفيّ فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن محمّد بن الحسين بن أبي الخطّاب، عن جعفر بن بشير، عن عبد اللّه بن محمّد الجعفيّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Al-Mithami
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Al-Mithami, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan Al-Ṣaffar, from Yaʿqub ibn Yazid, from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan ibn Ziyad, from Ahmad ibn Al-Hasan Al-Mithami.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن الميثميّ فقد رويته عن محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنه- عن محمّد بن الحسن الصفّار، عن يعقوب بن يزيد، عن محمّد بن الحسن بن زياد، عن أحمد ابن الحسن الميثميّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Abu Thamamah
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Abu Thamamah, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Ali Majilawayh, and Muhammad ibn Musa ibn Al-Mutawakkil, and Al-Husayn ibn Ibrahim - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them - from Ali ibn Ibrahim ibn Hashim, from his father, from Abu Thamamah, the companion of Abu Jafar Al-Thani, peace be upon him.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن أبي ثمامة فقد رويته عن محمّد بن عليّ ماجيلويه؛ و محمّد بن موسى بن المتوكّل؛ و الحسين بن إبراهيم- رضي اللّه عنهم- عن عليّ بن إبراهيم بن‌ هاشم، عن أبيه، عن أبي ثمامة صاحب أبي جعفر الثّاني عليه السّلام‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to ismaʿil Ibn Abi Fudayk
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Ismaʿil ibn Abi Fudayk, I have narrated it from Al-Husayn ibn Ahmad ibn Idris - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from his father, from Ibrahim ibn Hashim, from Muhammad ibn Sinan, from Al-Mufaḍḍal ibn Umar, from Ismaʿil ibn Abi Fudayk.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن إسماعيل بن أبي فديك فقد رويته عن الحسين بن أحمد بن إدريس- رضي اللّه عنه- عن أبيه، عن إبراهيم بن هاشم، عن محمّد بن سنان، عن المفضّل ابن عمر، عن إسماعيل بن أبي فديك‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Al-ṣabah Ibn Siyabah
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
