englishText: And whatever is narrated from Al-Ṣabah ibn Siyabah, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan Al-Ṣaffar, from Muhammad ibn Al-Husayn ibn Abi Al-Khaṭṭab, from Jafar ibn Bashir Al-Bajali, from Hammad ibn Uthman, from Al-Ṣabah ibn Siyabah, the brother of Abd Al-Rahman ibn Siyabah Al-Kufi.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن الصباح بن سيابة فقد رويته عن محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنه- عن محمّد بن الحسن الصفّار، عن محمّد بن الحسين بن أبي الخطّاب، عن جعفر بن بشير البجليّ، عن حمّاد بن عثمان، عن الصباح بن سيابة أخي عبد الرّحمن بن سيابة الكوفيّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Ibrahim Ibn Hashim
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Ibrahim ibn Hashim, I have narrated it from my father and from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them - from Saʿd ibn Abdullah and Abdullah ibn Jafar Al-Himyari together, from Ibrahim ibn Hashim. And I have also narrated it from Muhammad ibn Musa ibn Al-Mutawakkil - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Ali ibn Ibrahim, from his father Ibrahim ibn Hashim.
arabicText:
و ما كان فيه عن إبراهيم بن هاشم فقد رويته عن أبي؛ و محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنهما- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه؛ و عبد اللّه بن جعفر الحميريّ جميعا عن إبراهيم بن هاشم.
و رويته عن محمّد بن موسى بن المتوكّل- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عليّ بن إبراهيم، عن أبيه إبراهيم بن هاشم‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Ruh Ibn Abd Al-Rahim
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Ruh ibn Abd Al-Rahim, I have narrated it from Jafar ibn Ali ibn Al-Hasan ibn Ali ibn Abdullah ibn Al-Mughirah Al-Kufi, from his grandfather Al-Hasan ibn Ali Al-Kufi, from Al-Hasan ibn Ali ibn Faḍḍal, from Ghalib ibn Uthman, from Ruh ibn Abd Al-Rahim.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن روح بن عبد الرّحيم فقد رويته عن جعفر بن عليّ بن الحسن ابن علي بن عبد اللّه بن المغيرة الكوفيّ، عن جدّه الحسن بن عليّ الكوفيّ، عن الحسن ابن عليّ بن فضّال، عن غالب بن عثمان، عن روح بن عبد الرّحيم‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Abdullah Ibn Hammad Al-anṣari
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Abdullah ibn Hammad Al-Anṣari, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Musa ibn Al-Mutawakkil - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Ali ibn Al-Husayn Al-Saʿdaʾbadi, from Ahmad ibn Abi Abdillah Al-Barqi, from his father, from Muhammad ibn Sinan, from Abdullah ibn Hammad Al-Anṣari.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عبد اللّه بن حمّاد الأنصاريّ فقد رويته عن محمّد بن موسى بن المتوكّل- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عليّ بن الحسين السعدآباديّ، عن أحمد بن أبي عبد اللّه‌ البرقيّ، عن أبيه، عن محمّد بن سنان، عن عبد اللّه بن حمّاد الأنصاريّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to saʿid Ibn Yasar
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Saʿid ibn Yasar, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan Al-Ṣaffar, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn ʿIsa, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Abi Naṣr Al-Bazanti, from Al-Mufaḍḍal, from Saʿid ibn Yasar Al-Ajli Al-Aʿraj Al-Hannaṭ Al-Kufi.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن سعيد بن يسار فقد رويته عن محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنه- عن محمّد بن الحسن الصفّار، عن أحمد بن محمّد بن عيسى، عن أحمد بن محمّد بن أبي نصر البزنطيّ، عن المفضّل، عن سعيد بن يسار العجليّ الأعرج الحنّاط الكوفيّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Bishar Ibn Yasar
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Bishar ibn Yasar, I have narrated it from Al-Husayn ibn Ahmad ibn Idris - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from his father, from Muhammad ibn Abi Al-Ṣuhban, from Muhammad ibn Sinan, from Bishar ibn Yasar.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن بشّار بن يسار فقد رويته عن الحسين بن أحمد بن إدريس،- رضي اللّه عنه- عن أبيه، عن محمّد بن أبي الصهبان، عن محمّد بن سنان، عن بشّار بن يسار.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Muhammad Ibn Amr Ibn Abi Al-Miqdam
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Muhammad ibn Amr ibn Abi Al-Miqdam, I have narrated it from Ahmad ibn Ziyad ibn Jafar Al-Hamadani - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Ali ibn Ibrahim, from his father, from Muhammad ibn Sinan, from Muhammad ibn Amr ibn Abi Al-Miqdam.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن محمّد بن عمرو بن أبي المقدام فقد رويته، عن أحمد بن زياد بن جعفر الهمدانيّ- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عليّ بن إبراهيم، عن أبيه، عن محمّد بن سنان، عن محمّد بن عمرو بن أبي المقدام‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Abd Al-Malik Ibn Amr
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Abd Al-Malik ibn Amr, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Saʿd ibn Abdullah, from Muhammad ibn Al-Husayn ibn Abi Al-Khaṭṭab, from Al-Hakam ibn Miskin, from Abd Al-Malik ibn Amr Al-Ahwal Al-Kufi, and he was an Arab.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عبد الملك بن عمرو فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن محمّد بن الحسين بن أبي الخطّاب، عن الحكم بن مسكين، عن عبد الملك بن عمرو الأحول الكوفيّ و هو عربيّ‌.
thaqalaynMatn: from Abd Al-Malik ibn Amr, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Saʿd ibn Abdullah, from Muhammad ibn Al-Husayn ibn Abi Al-Khaṭṭab, from Al-Hakam ibn Miskin, from Abd Al-Malik ibn Amr Al-Ahwal Al-Kufi, and he was an Arab.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Yusuf Ibn yaʿqub
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Yusuf ibn Yaʿqub, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) have mercy on him - from Saʿd ibn Abdullah, from Muhammad ibn ʿIsa ibn Ubayd, from Muhammad ibn Sinan, from Yusuf ibn Yaʿqub, the brother of Yunus ibn Yaʿqub, and they were both Faṭhis.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن يوسف بن يعقوب فقد رويته عن أبي- رحمه اللّه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن محمّد بن عيسى بن عبيد، عن محمّد بن سنان، عن يوسف بن يعقوب أخي يونس بن يعقوب و كانا فطحيّين‌.
thaqalaynSanad: And whatever is narrated from Yusuf ibn Yaʿqub, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) have mercy on him - from Saʿd ibn Abdullah, from Muhammad ibn ʿIsa ibn Ubayd, from Muhammad ibn Sinan, from Yusuf ibn Yaʿqub,
thaqalaynMatn: the brother of Yunus ibn Yaʿqub, and they were both Faṭhis.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Muhammad Ibn Ali Ibn Mahbub
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Muhammad ibn Ali ibn Mahbub, I have narrated it from my father, and from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan, and from Muhammad ibn Musa ibn Al-Mutawakkil, and from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Yahya Al-Aṭṭar, and from Muhammad ibn Ali Majilawayh - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them - from Muhammad ibn Yahya Al-Aṭṭar, from Muhammad ibn Ali ibn Mahbub. And I have also narrated it from my father and from Al-Husayn ibn Ahmad ibn Idris - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them - from Ahmad ibn Idris, from Muhammad ibn Ali ibn Mahbub.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن محمّد بن عليّ بن محبوب فقد رويته عن أبي؛ و محمّد بن الحسن؛ و محمّد بن موسى بن المتوكّل؛ و أحمد بن محمّد بن يحيى العطّار؛ و محمّد بن عليّ ماجيلويه- رضي اللّه عنهم- عن محمّد بن يحيى العطّار، عن محمّد بن عليّ بن محبوب. و رويته عن أبي؛ و الحسين بن أحمد بن إدريس- رضي اللّه عنهما- عن أحمد بن إدريس، عن محمّد بن عليّ بن محبوب‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Muhammad Ibn Sinan
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Muhammad ibn Sinan, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Ali Majilawayh - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from his uncle Muhammad ibn Abi Al-Qasim, from Muhammad ibn Ali Al-Kufi, from Muhammad ibn Sinan. And I have also narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Ali ibn Ibrahim, from his father, from Muhammad ibn Sinan.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن محمّد بن سنان فقد رويته عن محمّد بن عليّ ماجيلويه- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عمّه محمّد بن أبي القاسم، عن محمّد بن عليّ الكوفيّ، عن محمّد بن سنان. و رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عليّ بن إبراهيم، عن أبيه، عن محمّد بن سنان‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Muhammad Ibn Al-Walid Al-Kirmani
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Muhammad ibn Al-Walid Al-Kirmani, I have narrated it from Ahmad ibn Ziyad ibn Jafar Al-Hamadani - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Ali ibn Ibrahim ibn Hashim, from Muhammad ibn Al-Walid Al-Kirmani.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن محمّد بن الوليد الكرمانيّ فقد رويته عن أحمد بن زياد بن جعفر الهمدانيّ- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عليّ بن إبراهيم بن هاشم، عن محمّد بن الوليد الكرمانيّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Muhammad Ibn manṣur
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Muhammad ibn Manṣur, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Ali Majilawayh - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Muhammad ibn Yahya Al-Aṭṭar, from Muhammad ibn Abi Al-Ṣuhban, from Muhammad ibn Sinan, from Muhammad ibn Manṣur.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن محمّد بن منصور فقد رويته عن محمّد بن عليّ ماجيلويه- رضي اللّه عنه- عن محمّد بن يحيى العطّار، عن محمّد بن أبي الصهبان، عن محمّد بن سنان، عن محمّد بن منصور.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Abdullah Ibn Al-Qasim
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Abdullah ibn Al-Qasim, I have narrated it from Al-Husayn ibn Ahmad ibn Idris - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from his father, from Muhammad ibn Ahmad ibn Yahya, who said: Abu Abdullah Al-Razi narrated to us from Abdullah ibn Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Khushnam Al-Aṣbahani, from Abdullah ibn Al-Qasim.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عبد اللّه بن القاسم فقد رويته عن الحسين بن أحمد بن إدريس- رضي اللّه عنه- عن أبيه، عن محمّد بن أحمد بن يحيى قال: حدّثنا أبو عبد اللّه الرّازيّ عن عبد اللّه بن أحمد بن محمّد بن خشنام الأصبهانيّ، عن عبد اللّه القاسم‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Abdullah Ibn Jablah
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Abdullah ibn Jablah, I have narrated it from my father, and from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan, and from Muhammad ibn Musa ibn Al-Mutawakkil - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them - from Abdullah ibn Jafar Al-Himyari, from Muhammad ibn Abd Al-Jabbar, from Abdullah ibn Jablah.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عبد اللّه بن جبلة فقد رويته عن أبي؛ و محمّد بن الحسن؛ و محمّد بن‌ موسى بن المتوكّل- رضي اللّه عنهم- عن عبد اللّه بن جعفر الحميريّ، عن محمّد بن عبد الجبّار، عن عبد اللّه بن جبلة.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Muhammad Ibn Abdullah Ibn Mihran
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Muhammad ibn Abdullah ibn Mihran, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Musa ibn Al-Mutawakkil - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Ali ibn Al-Husayn Al-Saʿdaʾbadi, from Ahmad ibn Abi Abdillah Al-Barqi, from Muhammad ibn Abdullah ibn Mihran.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن محمّد بن عبد اللّه بن مهران فقد رويته عن محمّد بن موسى بن المتوكّل- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عليّ بن الحسين السعدآباديّ، عن أحمد بن أبي عبد اللّه البرقيّ، عن محمّد بن عبد اللّه بن مهران‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Muhammad Ibn Al-fiḍ
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Muhammad ibn Al-Fiḍ, I have narrated it from Jafar ibn Muhammad ibn Masrur - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Al-Husayn ibn Muhammad ibn Amir, from his uncle Abdullah ibn Amir, from Ibn Abi Umayr, from Muhammad ibn Al-Fiḍ.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن محمّد بن الفيض فقد رويته عن جعفر بن محمّد بن مسرور- رضي اللّه عنه- عن الحسين بن محمّد بن عامر، عن عمّه عبد اللّه بن عامر، عن ابن أبي عمير، عن محمّد بن الفيض‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to thaʿlabah Ibn Maymun
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Thaʿlabah ibn Maymun, I have narrated it from my father, and from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan, and from Muhammad ibn Musa ibn Al-Mutawakkil - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them - from Abdullah ibn Jafar Al-Himyari, from Muhammad ibn Al-Husayn ibn Abi Al-Khaṭṭab, from Abdullah ibn Muhammad ibn Al-Hajjal Al-Asadi, from Abu Ishaq Thaʿlabah ibn Maymun. And I have also narrated it from them, from Al-Himyari, from Abdullah ibn Muhammad ibn ʿIsa, from Al-Hajjal, from Thaʿlabah.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن ثعلبة بن ميمون فقد رويته عن أبي؛ و محمّد بن الحسن؛ و محمّد بن موسى بن المتوكّل- رضي اللّه عنهم- عن عبد اللّه بن جعفر الحميريّ، عن محمّد بن الحسين بن أبي الخطّاب، عن عبد اللّه بن محمّد بن الحجّال الأسديّ، عن أبي إسحاق ثعلبة بن ميمون. و رويته أيضا عنهم، عن الحميريّ، عن عبد اللّه بن محمّد بن عيسى، عن الحجّال، عن ثعلبة.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Al-Abbas Ibn Amir Al-qaḍbani
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Al-Abbas ibn Amir Al-Qaḍbani, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) have mercy on him - from Ali ibn Al-Hasan ibn Ali Al-Kufi, from his father, from Al-Abbas ibn Amir Al-Qaṣbani. And I have also narrated it from Jafar ibn Ali ibn Al-Hasan ibn Ali Al-Kufi, from his grandfather Al-Hasan ibn Ali, from Al-Abbas ibn Amir Al-Qaṣbani.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن العبّاس بن عامر القضبانيّ فقد رويته عن أبي- رحمه اللّه- عن علي بن الحسن بن عليّ الكوفيّ، عن أبيه، عن العبّاس بن عامر القصبانيّ. و رويته عن جعفر بن عليّ بن الحسن بن عليّ الكوفيّ، عن جدّه الحسن بن عليّ، عن العبّاس ابن عامر القصبانيّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Rumi Ibn Zararah
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Rumi ibn Zararah, I have narrated it from Jafar ibn Muhammad ibn Masrur - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Al-Husayn ibn Muhammad ibn Amir, from his uncle Abdullah ibn Amir, from Muhammad ibn Abi Umayr, from Rumi ibn Zararah.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن روميّ بن زرارة فقد رويته عن جعفر بن محمّد بن مسرور- رضي اللّه عنه- عن الحسين بن محمّد بن عامر، عن عمّه عبد اللّه بن عامر، عن محمّد بن أبي عمير، عن روميّ بن زرارة.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Dawud Ibn Ishaq
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Dawud ibn Ishaq, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Ali Majilawayh - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from his uncle Muhammad ibn Abi Al-Qasim, from Ahmad ibn Abi Abdillah, from his father, from Muhammad ibn Sinan, from Dawud ibn Ishaq.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن داود بن إسحاق فقد رويته عن محمّد بن عليّ ماجيلويه- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عمّه محمّد بن أبي القاسم، عن أحمد بن أبي عبد اللّه، عن أبيه، عن محمّد بن سنان عن داود بن إسحاق‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Bakkar Ibn Kurdum
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Bakkar ibn Kurdum, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) have mercy on him - from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan Al-Ṣaffar, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn ʿIsa, from Muhammad ibn Sinan, from Bakkar ibn Kurdum.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن بكار بن كردم فقد رويته عن محمّد بن الحسن- رحمه اللّه- عن محمّد بن الحسن الصفّار، عن أحمد بن محمّد بن عيسى، عن محمّد بن سنان، عن بكار بن كردم‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain for Legal Cases of Amir Al-muʾminin, Peace Be Upon Him
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated in various reports regarding the legal cases of Amir Al-Muʾminin, peace be upon him, I have narrated it from my father and from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them - from Saʿd ibn Abdullah, from Ibrahim ibn Hashim, from Abd Al-Rahman ibn Abi Najran, from Aṣim ibn Humayd, from Muhammad ibn Qays, from Abu Jafar, peace be upon him.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه متفرّقا من قضايا أمير المؤمنين عليه السّلام فقد رويته عن أبي؛ و محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنهما- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن إبراهيم بن هاشم، عن عبد الرّحمن‌ ابن أبي نجران، عن عاصم بن حميد، عن محمّد بن قيس، عن أبي جعفر عليه السّلام‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Idris Ibn Abdullah Al-Qummi
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Idris ibn Abdullah Al-Qummi, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) have mercy on him - from Saʿd ibn Abdullah, from Muhammad ibn Al-Husayn ibn Abi Al-Khaṭṭab, from Jafar ibn Bashir, from Hammad ibn Uthman, from Idris ibn Abdullah ibn Saʿd Al-Ashari Al-Qummi.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن إدريس بن عبد اللّه القمّيّ فقد رويته عن أبي- رحمه اللّه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن محمّد بن الحسين بن أبي الخطّاب، عن جعفر بن بشير، عن حمّاد بن عثمان، عن إدريس بن عبد اللّه بن سعد الأشعريّ القمّيّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Salamah Ibn Al-khaṭṭab
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Salamah ibn Al-Khaṭṭab, I have narrated it from my father and from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them - from Saʿd ibn Abdullah, from Salamah ibn Al-Khaṭṭab Al-Barawastani.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن سلمة بن الخطّاب فقد رويته عن أبي؛ و محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنهما- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن سلمة بن الخطّاب البراوستانيّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Idris Ibn Zayd
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Idris ibn Zayd, I have narrated it from Ahmad ibn Ali ibn Ziyad - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Ali ibn Ibrahim, from his father, from Idris ibn Zayd Al-Qummi.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن إدريس بن زيد فقد رويته عن أحمد بن عليّ بن زياد- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عليّ بن إبراهيم، عن أبيه، عن إدريس بن زيد القمّيّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Muhammad Ibn Sahl
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Muhammad ibn Sahl, I have narrated it from my father and from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them - from Saʿd ibn Abdullah, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn ʿIsa, from Muhammad ibn Sahl ibn Al-Yasaʿ Al-Ashari.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن محمّد بن سهل فقد رويته عن أبي؛ و محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنهما- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن أحمد بن محمّد بن عيسى، عن محمّد بن سهل بن اليسع الأشعريّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Jafar Ibn Uthman
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Jafar ibn Uthman, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Ali ibn Musa Al-Kamandani, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn ʿIsa, from Al-Husayn ibn Saʿid, from Muhammad ibn Abi Umayr, from Abu Jafar Al-Shami, from Jafar ibn Uthman.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن جعفر بن عثمان فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عليّ بن موسى الكمندانيّ، عن أحمد بن محمّد بن عيسى، عن الحسين بن سعيد، عن محمّد بن‌ أبي عمير، عن أبي جعفر الشاميّ، عن جعفر بن عثمان‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Uthman Ibn Ziyad
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Uthman ibn Ziyad, I have narrated it from Abd Al-Wahid ibn Muhammad ibn Abdus Al-Aṭṭar Al-Nisaburi, from Ali ibn Muhammad ibn Qutaybah, from Hamdan ibn Sulayman, from Muhammad ibn Al-Husayn, from Uthman ibn ʿIsa, from Abd Al-Ṣamad ibn Bashir, from Uthman ibn Ziyad.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عثمان بن زياد فقد رويته عن عبد الواحد بن محمّد بن عبدوس العطّار النيسابوريّ، عن عليّ بن محمّد بن قتيبة، عن حمدان بن سليمان، عن محمّد بن الحسين، عن عثمان بن عيسى، عن عبد الصمد بن بشير، عن عثمان بن زياد.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Umayyah Ibn Amr, From Al-Shuayri
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Umayyah ibn Amr, from Al-Shuayri, I have narrated it from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Yahya Al-Aṭṭar - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Saʿd ibn Abdullah, from Ahmad ibn Hilal, from Umayyah ibn Amr, from Ismaʿil ibn Muslim Al-Shuayri.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن اميّة بن عمرو، عن الشعيريّ فقد رويته عن أحمد بن محمّد بن يحيى العطّار- رضي اللّه عنه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن أحمد بن هلال، عن اميّة بن عمرو، عن إسماعيل بن مسلم الشعيريّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Minhal Al-qaṣṣab
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Minhal Al-Qaṣṣab, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Muhammad ibn Yahya Al-Aṭṭar, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn ʿIsa, from Al-Hasan ibn Mahbub, from Minhal Al-Qaṣṣab.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن منهال القصّاب فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن محمّد بن يحيى العطّار، عن أحمد بن محمّد بن عيسى، عن الحسن بن محبوب، عن منهال القصّاب‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Masadah Ibn Ziyad
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Masadah ibn Ziyad, I have narrated it from my father and from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them - from Saʿd ibn Abdullah and Al-Himyari together, from Harun ibn Muslim, from Masadah ibn Ziyad.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن مسعدة بن زياد فقد رويته عن أبي؛ و محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنهما- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه؛ و الحميريّ جميعا عن هارون بن مسلم، عن مسعدة ابن زياد.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Dawud Ibn Abi Yazid
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Dawud ibn Abi Yazid, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Saʿd ibn Abdullah, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn ʿIsa, from Al-Abbas ibn Maʿruf, from Abu Muhammad Al-Hajjal, from Dawud ibn Abi Yazid.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن داود بن أبي يزيد فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن أحمد بن محمّد بن عيسى، عن العبّاس بن معروف، عن أبي محمّد الحجّال، عن داود بن أبي يزيد.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Thuwair Ibn Abi Fakhtah
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Thuwair ibn Abi Fakhtah, I have narrated it from my father and from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them - from Saʿd ibn Abdullah, from Al-Haytham ibn Abi Masruq Al-Nahdi, from Al-Hasan ibn Mahbub, from Malik ibn Aṭiyyah, from Thuwair ibn Abi Fakhtah, whose father's name was Saʿid ibn ʿIlaqah.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن ثوير بن أبي فاختة فقد رويته عن أبي؛ و محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنهما- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن الهيثم بن أبي مسروق النهديّ، عن الحسن بن محبوب، عن مالك بن عطيّة، عن ثوير بن أبي فاختة، و اسم أبي فاختة سعيد بن علاقة.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to ʿisa Ibn aʿyan
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from ʿIsa ibn Aʿyan, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Muhammad ibn Ahmad ibn Ali ibn Al-Ṣalt, from Abu Ṭalib Abdullah ibn Al-Ṣalt, from Abdullah ibn Al-Mughirah, from ʿIsa ibn Aʿyan.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عيسى بن أعين فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن محمّد بن‌ أحمد بن عليّ بن الصلت، عن أبي طالب عبد اللّه بن الصلت، عن عبد اللّه بن المغيرة، عن عيسى بن أعين‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Muhammad Ibn Hassan
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Muhammad ibn Hassan, I have narrated it from my father, and from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan, and from Al-Husayn ibn Ahmad ibn Idris - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them - from Ahmad ibn Idris, from Muhammad ibn Hassan.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن محمّد بن حسّان فقد رويته عن أبي؛ و محمّد بن الحسن؛ و الحسين بن أحمد بن إدريس- رضي اللّه عنهم- عن أحمد بن إدريس، عن محمّد بن حسّان‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Ahmad Ibn Muhammad Ibn ʿisa Al-Ashari
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn ʿIsa Al-Ashari - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - I have narrated it from my father and from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them - from Saʿd ibn Abdullah and Abdullah ibn Jafar Al-Himyari together, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn ʿIsa Al-Ashari.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن أحمد بن محمّد بن عيسى الأشعريّ- رضي اللّه عنه- فقد رويته عن أبي؛ و محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنهما- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه؛ و عبد اللّه بن جعفر الحميريّ جميعا عن أحمد بن محمّد بن عيسى الأشعريّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Umar Ibn Abi shuʿbah
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Umar ibn Abi Shuʿbah, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Ali Majilawayh - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Muhammad ibn Yahya, from Muhammad ibn Al-Husayn ibn Abi Al-Khaṭṭab, from Jafar ibn Bashir, from Hammad ibn Uthman, from Umar ibn Abi Shuʿbah Al-Halabi.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عمر بن أبي شعبة فقد رويته عن محمّد بن عليّ ماجيلويه- رضي اللّه عنه- عن محمّد بن يحيى، عن محمّد بن الحسين بن أبي الخطّاب، عن جعفر بن بشير، عن حمّاد بن عثمان، عن عمر بن أبي شعبة الحلبيّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Umar Ibn Qays Al-maṣir
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Umar ibn Qays Al-Maṣir, I have narrated it from my father and from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) have mercy on them - from Saʿd ibn Abdullah, from Ahmad ibn Abi Abdillah Al-Barqi, from his father, from Muhammad ibn Sinan and others, from Umar ibn Qays Al-Maṣir.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عمر بن قيس الماصر فقد رويته عن أبي؛ و محمّد بن الحسن- رحمهما اللّه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن أحمد بن أبي عبد اللّه البرقيّ، عن أبيه، عن محمّد بن سنان و غيره، عن عمر بن قيس الماصر.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Abu saʿid Al-Khudri Regarding the Will of the Prophet, Peace and Blessings Be Upon Him and His Family, to Ali, Peace Be Upon Him
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText:
And whatever is narrated from Abu Saʿid Al-Khudri regarding the will of the Prophet, peace and blessings be upon him and his family, to Ali, peace be upon him, which begins with the statement: "O' Ali, when the bride enters your house," I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Ibrahim ibn Ishaq Al-Ṭalqani - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Abu Saʿid Al-Hasan ibn Ali Al-Adawi, from Yusuf ibn Yahya Al-Aṣbahani Abu Yaʿqub, from Abu Ali Ismaʿil ibn Hatim.
Abu Jafar Ahmad ibn Ṣalih ibn Saʿid Al-Makki narrated to us, who said: Umar ibn Hafṣ narrated to us, from Ishaq ibn Najih, from Huṣayf, from Mujahid, from Abu Saʿid Al-Khudri, who said: The Messenger of Allah (swt), peace and blessings be upon him and his family, entrusted his will to Ali ibn Abi Ṭalib, peace be upon him, and said: "O' Ali, when the bride enters your house," and he narrated the hadith in its entirety as recorded in this book.
arabicText:
و ما كان فيه عن أبي سعيد الخدريّ من وصيّة النبيّ صلّى اللّه عليه و آله لعليّ عليه السّلام- التي أوّلها "يا عليّ إذا دخلت العروس بيتك"- فقد رويته عن محمّد بن إبراهيم بن إسحاق الطالقانيّ- رضي اللّه عنه- عن أبي سعيد الحسن بن عليّ العدويّ، عن يوسف بن يحيى الأصبهانيّ أبي يعقوب، عن أبي عليّ إسماعيل بن حاتم قال:
حدّثنا أبو جعفر أحمد بن صالح بن سعيد المكّيّ قال: حدّثنا عمر [و] بن حفص، عن إسحاق بن نجيح، عن حصيف، عن مجاهد، عن أبي سعيد الخدريّ قال: أوصى رسول- اللّه صلّى اللّه عليه و آله إلى عليّ بن أبي طالب عليه السّلام فقال: يا عليّ إذا دخلت العروس بيتك- و ذكر الحديث بطوله على ما في هذا الكتاب.
thaqalaynSanad: And whatever is narrated from Abu Saʿid Al-Khudri regarding the will of the Prophet, peace and blessings be upon him and his family, to Ali, peace be upon him, which begins with the statement:
thaqalaynMatn:
"O' Ali, when the bride enters your house," I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Ibrahim ibn Ishaq Al-Ṭalqani - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Abu Saʿid Al-Hasan ibn Ali Al-Adawi, from Yusuf ibn Yahya Al-Aṣbahani Abu Yaʿqub, from Abu Ali Ismaʿil ibn Hatim.
Abu Jafar Ahmad ibn Ṣalih ibn Saʿid Al-Makki narrated to us, who said: Umar ibn Hafṣ narrated to us, from Ishaq ibn Najih, from Huṣayf, from Mujahid, from Abu Saʿid Al-Khudri, who said: The Messenger of Allah (swt), peace and blessings be upon him and his family, entrusted his will to Ali ibn Abi Ṭalib, peace be upon him, and said: "O' Ali, when the bride enters your house," and he narrated the hadith in its entirety as recorded in this book.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Ali Ibn Hassan
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Ali ibn Hassan, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan Al-Ṣaffar, from Ali ibn Hassan Al-Wasiṭi. And I have also narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Saʿd ibn Abdullah, from Al-Hasan ibn Musa Al-Khashshab, from Ali ibn Hassan Al-Wasiṭi.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عليّ بن حسّان فقد رويته عن محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنه- عن محمّد بن الحسن الصفّار، عن عليّ بن حسّان الواسطيّ؛ و رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن الحسن بن موسى الخشّاب، عن عليّ بن حسان الواسطيّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to ismaʿil Ibn Mihran Regarding the Words of faṭimah, Peace Be Upon Her
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Ismaʿil ibn Mihran regarding the words of Faṭimah, peace be upon her, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Musa ibn Al-Mutawakkil - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Ali ibn Al-Husayn Al-Saʿdaʾbadi, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Khalid Al-Barqi, from his father, from Ismaʿil ibn Mihran, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad Al-Khuzaʿi, from Muhammad ibn Jabir, from Abbad Al-Amiri, from Zaynab, the daughter of Amir Al-Muʾminin, peace be upon them, from Faṭimah, peace be upon her.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن إسماعيل بن مهران من كلام فاطمة عليها السّلام فقد رويته عن محمّد بن موسى بن المتوكّل- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عليّ بن الحسين السعدآباديّ، عن أحمد بن محمّد بن خالد البرقيّ، عن أبيه، عن إسماعيل بن مهران، عن أحمد بن محمّد الخزاعيّ، عن محمّد بن جابر، عن عبّاد العامريّ، عن زينب بنت أمير المؤمنين عليهما السّلام، عن‌ فاطمة عليها السّلام‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Shuayb Ibn Waqid Regarding the Prohibitions
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Shuayb ibn Waqid regarding the prohibitions, I have narrated it from Hamzah ibn Muhammad ibn Ahmad ibn Jafar ibn Muhammad ibn Zayd ibn Ali ibn Al-Husayn ibn Ali ibn Abi Ṭalib, peace be upon them, who said: Abu Abdullah Abd Al-Aziz ibn Muhammad ibn ʿIsa Al-Abhari narrated to me, who said: Abu Abdullah Muhammad ibn Zakariya Al-Jawhari Al-Ghallabi Al-Baṣri narrated to us, who said: Shuayb ibn Waqid narrated to us, who said: Al-Husayn ibn Zayd narrated to us, from Al-Ṣadiq Jafar ibn Muhammad, from his father, from his forefathers, from Amir Al-Muʾminin Ali ibn Abi Ṭalib, peace be upon him, who said: The Messenger of Allah (swt), peace and blessings be upon him and his family, forbade eating while in a state of major ritual impurity (janabah) and said that it causes poverty, and he narrated the hadith in its entirety as recorded in this book.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن شعيب بن واقد في المناهي فقد رويته عن حمزة بن محمّد بن أحمد ابن جعفر بن محمّد بن زيد بن عليّ بن الحسين بن عليّ بن أبي طالب عليهم السّلام قال: حدّثني أبو عبد اللّه عبد العزيز بن محمّد بن عيسى الأبهريّ قال: حدّثنا أبو عبد اللّه محمّد بن زكريّا الجوهريّ الغلابيّ البصريّ قال: حدّثنا شعيب بن واقد قال: حدّثنا الحسين بن زيد، عن الصادق جعفر بن محمّد، عن أبيه، عن آبائه، عن أمير المؤمنين عليّ بن أبي- طالب عليهم السّلام قال: نهى رسول اللّه صلّى اللّه عليه و آله عن الأكل على الجنابة و قال: إنّه يورث الفقر و ذكر الحديث بطوله كما في هذا الكتاب‌.
thaqalaynSanad: And whatever is narrated from Shuayb ibn Waqid regarding the prohibitions, I have narrated it from Hamzah ibn Muhammad ibn Ahmad ibn Jafar ibn Muhammad ibn Zayd ibn Ali ibn Al-Husayn ibn Ali ibn Abi Ṭalib, peace be upon them, who said: Abu Abdullah Abd Al-Aziz ibn Muhammad ibn ʿIsa Al-Abhari narrated to me, who said: Abu Abdullah Muhammad ibn Zakariya Al-Jawhari Al-Ghallabi Al-Baṣri narrated to us, who said: Shuayb ibn Waqid narrated to us, who said: Al-Husayn ibn Zayd narrated to us, from Al-Ṣadiq Jafar ibn Muhammad, from his father, from his forefathers, from Amir Al-Muʾminin Ali ibn Abi Ṭalib, peace be upon him, who said:
thaqalaynMatn: The Messenger of Allah (swt), peace and blessings be upon him and his family, forbade eating while in a state of major ritual impurity (janabah) and said that it causes poverty, and he narrated the hadith in its entirety as recorded in this book.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Ali Ibn ismaʿil Al-Mithami
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Ali ibn Ismaʿil Al-Mithami, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Saʿd ibn Abdullah, from Muhammad ibn Al-Husayn ibn Abi Al-Khaṭṭab, from Ṣafwan ibn Yahya, from Ali ibn Ismaʿil Al-Mithami.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عليّ بن إسماعيل الميثميّ فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن محمّد بن الحسين بن أبي الخطّاب، عن صفوان بن يحيى، عن عليّ بن إسماعيل الميثميّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to yaʿqub Ibn Yazid
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Yaʿqub ibn Yazid, I have narrated it from my father and from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them - from Saʿd ibn Abdullah, and Abdullah ibn Jafar Al-Himyari, and Muhammad ibn Yahya Al-Aṭṭar, and Ahmad ibn Idris - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them - from Yaʿqub ibn Yazid.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن يعقوب بن يزيد فقد رويته عن أبي؛ و محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنهما- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، و عبد اللّه بن جعفر الحميريّ؛ و محمّد بن يحيى العطّار و أحمد بن إدريس- رضي اللّه عنهم- عن يعقوب بن يزيد.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Al-Hasan Ibn Ali Ibn Al-nuʿman
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Al-Hasan ibn Ali ibn Al-Nuʿman, I have narrated it from my father and from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them - from Saʿd ibn Abdullah, from Al-Hasan ibn Ali ibn Al-Nuʿman.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن الحسن بن عليّ بن النعمان فقد رويته عن أبي؛ و محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنهما- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن الحسن بن عليّ بن النعمان‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Abd Al-Hamid
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Abd Al-Hamid, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Ali Majilawayh - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from his uncle Muhammad ibn Abi Al-Qasim, from Muhammad ibn Ali Al-Qurashi, from Ismaʿil ibn Bashshar, from Ahmad ibn Habib, from Al-Hakam Al-Khayyaṭ, from Abd Al-Hamid Al-Azdi.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عبد الحميد فقد رويته عن محمّد بن عليّ ماجيلويه- رضي اللّه عنه- عن عمّه محمّد بن أبي القاسم، عن محمّد بن عليّ القرشيّ، عن إسماعيل بن بشّار عن أحمد بن حبيب، عن الحكم الخيّاط، عن عبد الحميد الأزديّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Salamah Ibn Tammam, the Companion of Amir Al-muʾminin, Peace Be Upon Him
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Salamah ibn Tammam, the companion of Amir Al-Muʾminin, peace be upon him, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Saʿd ibn Abdullah, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn ʿIsa, from Al-Husayn ibn Saʿid, from Hammad ibn ʿIsa, from Hariz, from Salamah ibn Tammam, the companion of Amir Al-Muʾminin, peace be upon him.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن سلمة بن تمام صاحب أمير المؤمنين عليه السّلام‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Muhammad Ibn Aslam Al-Jabali
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Muhammad ibn Aslam Al-Jabali, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Al-Hasan ibn Matil, from Muhammad ibn Hassan Al-Razi, from Muhammad ibn Zayd Al-Razzami, the servant of Al-Riḍa, peace be upon him, from Muhammad ibn Aslam Al-Jabali. And I have also narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Saʿd ibn Abdullah, from Muhammad ibn Al-Husayn ibn Abi Al-Khaṭṭab, from Muhammad ibn Aslam Al-Jabali.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن محمّد بن أسلم الجبليّ فقد رويته عن محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه‌ عنه- عن الحسن بن متّيل، عن محمّد بن حسّان الرّازيّ، عن محمّد بن زيد الرّزاميّ خادم الرضا عليه السلام عن محمّد بن أسلم الجبليّ. و رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه عنه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن محمّد بن الحسين بن أبي الخطّاب، عن محمّد بن أسلم الجبليّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Muhammad Ibn yaʿqub Al-Kulayni
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText:
And whatever is narrated from Muhammad ibn Yaʿqub Al-Kulayni - may Allah (swt) have mercy on him - I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Muhammad ibn Aṣam Al-Kulayni, and Ali ibn Ahmad ibn Musa, and Muhammad ibn Ahmad Al-Sanani - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them - from Muhammad ibn Yaʿqub Al-Kulayni. And likewise, the entire book of Al-Kafi, I have narrated it from them from him, through his transmitters.
[Clarification of the transmission chain to Muhammad ibn Al-Husayn ibn Abi Al-Khaṭṭab]
بيان الطريق إلى محمّد بن الحسين بن أبي الخطّاب‌
معتبر
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن محمّد بن يعقوب الكلينيّ- رحمة اللّه عليه- فقد رويته عن محمّد بن محمّد بن عصام الكلينيّ؛ و عليّ بن أحمد بن موسى؛ و محمّد بن أحمد السنانيّ- رضي اللّه عنهم- عن محمّد بن يعقوب الكلينيّ؛ و كذلك جميع كتاب الكافي فقد رويته عنهم عنه عن رجاله‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Muhammad Ibn yaʿqub Al-Kulayni
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Muhammad ibn Al-Husayn ibn Abi Al-Khaṭṭab, I have narrated it from my father and from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them - from Saʿd ibn Abdullah, and Al-Himyari, and Muhammad ibn Yahya, and Ahmad ibn Idris, all together from Muhammad ibn Al-Husayn ibn Abi Al-Khaṭṭab Al-Zayyat, whose father's name was Zayd.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن محمّد بن الحسين بن أبي الخطّاب فقد رويته عن أبي؛ و محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنهما- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه؛ و الحميريّ؛ و محمّد بن يحيى، و أحمد ابن إدريس جميعا عن محمّد بن الحسين بن أبي الخطّاب الزّيّات، و اسم أبي الخطّاب زيد.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Al-Abbas Ibn maʿruf
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Al-Abbas ibn Maʿruf, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan Al-Ṣaffar, from Al-Abbas ibn Maʿruf. And I have also narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) have mercy on him - from Saʿd ibn Abdullah, from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn ʿIsa and Ahmad ibn Abi Abdillah Al-Barqi together, from Al-Abbas ibn Maʿruf.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن العبّاس بن معروف فقد رويته عن محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنه- عن محمّد بن الحسن الصفّار، عن العبّاس بن معروف. و قد رويته عن أبي- رحمه اللّه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن أحمد بن محمّد بن عيسى؛ و أحمد بن أبي عبد اللّه البرقيّ جميعا عن العبّاس بن معروف‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Muawiyah Ibn Hakim
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Muawiyah ibn Hakim, I have narrated it from my father and from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them - from Saʿd ibn Abdullah, from Muawiyah ibn Hakim. And I have also narrated it from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan Al-Ṣaffar, from Muawiyah ibn Hakim.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن معاوية بن حكيم فقد رويته عن أبي، و محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنهما- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن معاوية بن حكيم. و رويته عن محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنه- عن محمّد بن الحسن الصفّار، عن معاوية بن حكيم‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Abu Al-jawzaʾ
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Abu Al-Jawzaʾ, I have narrated it from my father and from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them - from Saʿd ibn Abdullah, from Abu Al-Jawzaʾ Al-Munabbih ibn Abdullah. And I have also narrated it from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan Al-Ṣaffar, from Abu Al-Jawzaʾ.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن أبي الجوزاء فقد رويته عن أبي؛ و محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنهما- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن أبي الجوزاء المنبّه بن عبد اللّه. و رويته عن محمّد بن الحسن- رضي اللّه عنه- عن محمّد بن الحسن الصفّار، عن أبي الجوزاء.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Hamdan Ibn Al-Husayn
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Hamdan ibn Al-Husayn, I have narrated it from Ali ibn Hatim by authorization, who said: Al-Qasim ibn Muhammad informed us, who said: Hamdan ibn Al-Husayn narrated to us.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن حمدان بن الحسين فقد رويته عن عليّ بن حاتم إجازة قال: أخبرنا القاسم بن محمّد قال: حدّثنا حمدان بن الحسين‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Hammad Ibn Amr and Anas Ibn Muhammad Regarding the Will of the Prophet, Peace and Blessings Be Upon Him and His Family, to the Commander of the Faithful, Peace Be Upon Him
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText:
And what has been narrated from Hammad bin Amr and Anas bin Muhammad in the will of the Prophet, peace and blessings be upon him and his family, to the Commander of the Faithful, peace be upon him, I have narrated it from Muhammad bin Ali Al-Sha' at Marw Al-Rudh, who said: Abu Hamid Ahmad bin Muhammad bin Ahmad bin Al-Husayn told us, who said: Abu Yazid Ahmad bin Khalid Al-Khalidi told us, who said:
Muhammad bin Ahmad bin Salih Al-Tamimi told us, who said: My father, Ahmad bin Salih Al-Tamimi, informed us, who said: Muhammad bin Hatim Al-Qattan informed us, from Hammad bin Amr, from Ja'far bin Muhammad, from his father, from his grandfather, from Ali bin Abi Talib, peace be upon them. And I have also narrated it from Muhammad bin Ali Al-Shah, who said: Abu Hamid told us, who said: Abu Yazid informed us, who said: Muhammad bin Ahmad bin Salih Al-Tamimi informed us, who said:
My father told us, who said: Anas bin Muhammad Abu Malik told me, from his father, from Ja'far bin Muhammad, from his father, from his grandfather, from Ali bin Abi Talib, peace be upon them, from the Prophet, peace and blessings be upon him and his family, who said to him: O' Ali, I advise you with a will, so preserve it, for you will remain in goodness as long as you preserve my will. And he mentioned the entire narration.
arabicText:
و ما كان فيه عن حمّاد بن عمرو؛ و أنس بن محمّد في وصيّة النبيّ صلّى اللّه عليه و آله لأمير- المؤمنين عليه السّلام فقد رويته عن محمّد بن عليّ الشاء بمروالرّود قال: حدّثنا أبو حامد أحمد بن محمّد بن أحمد بن الحسين قال: حدّثنا أبو يزيد أحمد بن خالد الخالديّ قال:
حدّثنا محمّد بن أحمد بن صالح التميميّ قال: أخبرنا أبي: أحمد بن صالح التّميميّ قال أخبرنا محمّد بن حاتم القطّان، عن حمّاد بن عمرو، عن جعفر بن محمّد، عن أبيه، عن جدّه، عن عليّ بن أبي طالب عليهم السّلام. و رويته أيضا عن محمّد بن عليّ الشاه قال: حدّثنا أبو حامد قال: أخبرنا أبو يزيد قال: أخبرنا محمّد بن أحمد بن صالح التميميّ قال:
حدّثنا أبي قال: حدّثني أنس بن محمّد أبو مالك، عن أبيه، عن جعفر بن محمّد، عن أبيه، عن جدّه، عن عليّ بن أبي طالب عليهم السّلام عن النبيّ صلّى اللّه عليه و آله قال له: يا عليّ أوصيك بوصيّة فاحفظها فلا تزال بخير ما حفظت وصيّتي- و ذكر الحديث بطوله‌.
thaqalaynSanad:
And what has been narrated from Hammad bin Amr and Anas bin Muhammad in the will of the Prophet, peace and blessings be upon him and his family, to the Commander of the Faithful, peace be upon him, I have narrated it from Muhammad bin Ali Al-Sha' at Marw Al-Rudh, who said: Abu Hamid Ahmad bin Muhammad bin Ahmad bin Al-Husayn told us, who said: Abu Yazid Ahmad bin Khalid Al-Khalidi told us, who said:
Muhammad bin Ahmad bin Salih Al-Tamimi told us, who said: My father, Ahmad bin Salih Al-Tamimi, informed us, who said: Muhammad bin Hatim Al-Qattan informed us, from Hammad bin Amr, from Ja'far bin Muhammad, from his father, from his grandfather, from Ali bin Abi Talib, peace be upon them. And I have also narrated it from Muhammad bin Ali Al-Shah, who said: Abu Hamid told us, who said: Abu Yazid informed us, who said: Muhammad bin Ahmad bin Salih Al-Tamimi informed us, who said:
My father told us, who said: Anas bin Muhammad Abu Malik told me, from his father, from Ja'far bin Muhammad, from his father, from his grandfather, from Ali bin Abi Talib, peace be upon them, from the Prophet, peace and blessings be upon him and his family, who said to him:
thaqalaynMatn: O' Ali, I advise you with a will, so preserve it, for you will remain in goodness as long as you preserve my will. And he mentioned the entire narration.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Ahmad Ibn Muhammad Ibn saʿid Al-Hamadani
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Saʿid Al-Hamadani, I have narrated it from Muhammad ibn Ibrahim ibn Ishaq Al-Ṭalqani - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Saʿid Al-Hamadani Al-Kufi, the freed slave of Banu Hashim.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن أحمد بن محمّد بن سعيد الهمدانيّ فقد رويته عن محمّد بن إبراهيم ابن إسحاق الطالقانيّ- رضي اللّه عنه- عن أحمد بن محمّد بن سعيد الهمدانيّ الكوفيّ مولى بني هاشم‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Al-Mualla Ibn Muhammad Al-baṣri
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Al-Mualla ibn Muhammad Al-Baṣri, I have narrated it from my father, and from Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan, and from Jafar ibn Muhammad ibn Masrur - may Allah (swt) be pleased with them - from Al-Husayn ibn Muhammad ibn Amir, from Al-Mualla ibn Muhammad Al-Baṣri.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن المعلّى بن محمّد البصريّ فقد رويته عن أبي؛ و محمّد بن الحسن؛ و جعفر بن محمّد بن مسرور- رضي اللّه عنهم- عن الحسين بن محمّد بن عامر، عن المعلّى ابن محمّد البصريّ‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to Abd Al-Wahid Ibn Muhammad Ibn Abdus Al-Nisaburi
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Abd Al-Wahid ibn Muhammad ibn Abdus Al-Nisaburi, I have narrated it from him.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن عبد الواحد بن محمّد بن عبدوس النيسابوريّ فقد رويته عنه‌.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to saʿd Ibn ṭarif Al-Khiffaf
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: And whatever is narrated from Saʿd ibn Ṭarif Al-Khiffaf, I have narrated it from my father - may Allah (swt) be pleased with him - from Saʿd ibn Abdullah, from Al-Haytham ibn Abi Masruq Al-Nahdi, from Al-Husayn ibn Alwan, from Amr ibn Thabit, from Saʿd ibn Ṭarif Al-Khiffaf.
arabicText: و ما كان فيه عن سعد بن طريف الخفّاف‌ فقد رويته عن أبي- رضي اللّه‌ عنه- عن سعد بن عبد اللّه، عن الهيثم بن أبي مسروق النّهديّ، عن الحسين بن علوان، عن عمرو بن ثابت، عن سعد بن طريف الخفّاف.

chapter: Clarification of the Transmission Chain to saʿd Ibn ṭarif Al-Khiffaf
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText: The chains of transmission for the book Man La Yahḍuruhu Al-Faqih have been completed by the grace and favor of Allah (swt), and blessings be upon Muhammad and his pure family.
arabicText: تمّت أسانيد كتاب من لا يحضره الفقيه بحمد اللّه و منّه، و الصّلاة على محمّد و آله الطاهرين‌.

chapter: The Ijaza of Sayed Abu ‘abdullah Al-Madani
author: Shaykh Muḥammad b. ʿAlī al-Ṣaduq
englishText:
Muhammad ibn Ali ibn Al-Husayn ibn Musa ibn Babawayh Al-Qummi, the author of this book, says:
The noble, virtuous Sayyid Abu Abdullah Muhammad ibn Al-Hasan Al-Alawi Al-Mousawi Al-Madani, known as Ni'mah - may Allah (swt) continue to support, grant success, and guide him - has heard this book from beginning to end as I recited it to him, and I have narrated it from my mentioned teachers.
This took place in the land of Balkh, in the region of Ilagh. I have written this with my own hand, praising Allah (swt) and expressing gratitude, and sending prayers and peace upon Muhammad and his family. Ameen, O' Lord (azj) of the worlds.
arabicText:
يقول محمّد بن عليّ بن [الحسين بن‌] موسى بن بابويه القمّيّ مصنّف هذا الكتاب:
قد سمع السّيّد الشّريف الفاضل أبو عبد اللّه محمّد بن الحسن العلويّ الموسويّ المدينيّ المعروف بنعمة- أدام اللّه تأييده و توفيقه و تسديده- هذا الكتاب من‌ أوّله إلى آخره بقراءتي عليه، و رويته عن مشايخي المذكورين و ذلك بأرض بلخ من ناحية إيلاق، و كتبت بخطّي حامدا للّه و شاكرا و على محمّد و آله مصلّيا و مسلّما، آمين يا ربّ العالمين.
